GS24paribhsu:175_1: prasakte niyamārthaḥ kriyāvācakādiprayoga ityetattātparyakeṇa sāmānyataḥ kriyājanyaphalāśrayatvamātravivakṣāyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:175_2: dvitīyādīnāṃ sādhutvānvākhyānamityarthalābhena pāṭhanakriyānvayakāle padasyaiva gauṇarthatvapratītiḥ prayokturapi /
GS24paribhsu:176: etanmūlakaḥ“abhivyaktapadārthāḥ ye' iti ślokopi padakāryaviṣayakaḥ/ dhvanitaṃ cedam 'sarvādīni' iti sūtre saṃjñābhūtānāṃ pratiṣedhamārabhatā vārttikakṛtā,
GS24paribhsu:180: śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyātve-iti 'ot' sūtrastha bhāṣyasya laukikārthavatvayogyapadāśraya
GS24paribhsu:182: tadrahitaśabdāśraye ca te ityarthaḥ/ 'gotaḥ' iti yathāśrutasūtre viśiṣṭarūpopādānasatvenoktarītyaivatasya
GS24paribhsu:186: aninasmingrahaṇānyarthavatā cānarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti // Paribh_15 //
GS24paribhsu:187: 'yena vidhiḥ' ityatra bhāṣye vacana rūpeṇa paṭhitaiṣā/ tena 'rājñā' 'sāmnā' ityādvallopaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:190_0: 'suśarmā' 'suprathimā' ityādau 'manaḥ' iti ṅībniṣedhaśca siddhaḥ / anye tu 'parivīviṣīdhvam'
GS24paribhsu:191: tanmūlakamidamityāhuḥ/ 'vibhāṣeṭaḥ' ityatrānarthakasyaiva ṣīdhvamaḥ sambhavādatrāpi tasyaiva grahaṇamiti bhramavāraṇāya 'aṅgāt' iti pare//
GS24paribhsu:192: nanu 'uśca' ityatra 'liṅsicau' ityataḥ 'ātmanepadeṣu' ityeva sambadhyeta, anantaratvādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:194: ekayoganirdiṣṭānāṃ saha vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttiḥ // Paribh_16 //
GS24paribhsu:195_1: ekakārya niyuktānāṃ bahūnāṃ loke tathaiva darśanāditi bhāvaḥ / yattu-atra jñāpakam
GS24paribhsu:196_2: 'kvacidekadeśo 'pi anuvartate' iti nyāyena siddhā / vastu tastu 'dīdhīvevīṭām' iti
GS24paribhsu:197: 'ārdhadhātukasya' iti sūtrastheḍgrahaṇasya 'neḍvaśi' iti sūtre bhāṣye pratyākhyānāt,
GS24paribhsu:201: ekayoganirdiṣṭatvāt/ tathā 'dāmahāyanāntācca' ityādau 'saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ' ityataḥ saṅkhyāderityanuvartate 'vyayāderiti nivṛttamiti cānupapannamata āha-
GS24paribhsu:204_1: iti 'pakṣāttiḥ' iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ / tāvanmātrāṃṣe svaritatvapratijñābalāllabhyamidam /
GS24paribhsu:204_2: spaṣṭā ceyam 'dāmahāyanāntācca' iti sūtre 'auto 'mśasoḥ' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye pūrvā ca //
GS24paribhsu:211: netyarthaḥ/ ata evāṇuditsūtre pratyayā'deśā'gameṣu savarṇagrahaṇābhāvaṃ prakārāntareṇoktvā,
GS24paribhsu:212: 'evaṃ tarhi siddhe yadapratyaya iti pratiṣedhaṃ śāsti,
GS24paribhsu:213: tajjñāpayati bhavatyeṣāparibhāṣā 'bhāvyamānena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na' iti/ kiñca,
GS24paribhsu:214: 'jyāda īyasaḥ' ityevāntaryato dīrghe siddhe 'jyādāt' iti dīrgoccāraṇamasyā jñāpakam/ aṇuditsūtre 'jyādāt' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye spaṣṭaiṣā/
GS24paribhsu:218: nanvevam 'adaso 'seḥ' ityādinā 'amū' ityādau dīrgavidhānaṃ na syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:221: 'diva ut' 'ṛta ut' iti taparakaraṇamasyā jñapakam/ 'titsvaritam' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭaiṣā//
GS24paribhsu:222: nanu 'gave hitaṃ gohitam' ityādau pratyayalakṣaṇenāvādyādeśāpattirata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:225_0: varṇaprādhānyaviṣayametat / tatvaṃ ca 'pratyayalope' iti sūtre sthānivadityanuvṛtyaiva
GS24paribhsu:225_1: siddhe pratyayalakṣaṇagrahaṇaṃ pratyayetarāviśeṣaṇatvarūpaṃ yatra prādhānyaṃ tatraiva
GS24paribhsu:226: 'citrāyāṃ jātā citrā' ityādāvaṇyo 'kārastadantān ṅīp ca na/ iyamalvidhau sthānivatvāprāptāvapi prāptapratyayalakṣaṇavidherniṣedhiketi spaṣṭaṃ bhāṣye//
GS24paribhsu:227: nanu 'ataḥ kṛkami' ityatra kami grahaṇe siddhe, kaṃsagrahaṇaṃ vyartham, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:231_1: vyutpannānītyapi / idaṃ śākaṭāyanarītyā / pāṇinestvavyutpattipakṣa eveti śabdendu
GS24paribhsu:235_1: gṛhyamāṇa upatiṣṭata iti śeṣaḥ / tena tadādyantāṃśaḥ siddhaḥ / tadantāṃśastu“yenavidhiḥ“ityanena
GS24paribhsu:235_2: siddhaḥ / sa ca śabdarūpaṃ viśeṣyamādāya viśeṣyāntarāsatve / yattu pratyayena svaprakṛtyavayavakasamudāyākṣepāt
GS24paribhsu:237: 'iyān' ityādau tasya tādṛśasamudāyena vyabhicāreṇākṣepasambhavāt/ yatra pratyayo nimittatvenāśrīyate,
GS24paribhsu:241: parantu tatra pañcamyantatā/ ata eva“eṅhrasvāt“iti sūtre eṅantādityarthalābhaḥ/ asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāntaram,
GS24paribhsu:245: na viśiṣṭāt/ niṣkṛṣya tāvanmātreṇaikārthībhāvābhāve 'pi vṛttirbhavatyeva/ atra cedaṃ bhāṣyameva mānamityanyatra vistaraḥ/ pratyayamātragrahaṇe eṣā,
GS24paribhsu:247: pratyayāpratyayagrahaṇa iti“ugitaśca“iti sūtre bhāṣye/ iyamaṅgasaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:248: yena vidhiriti sūtre bhāṣya etadghaṭakatadantāṃśasyāpavādaḥ paṭhyate :-
GS24paribhsu:252_0: tatra tadantavidhirnetyarthaḥ / yathā“radābhyāṃ niṣṭātonaḥ“ityatra / tena dṛṣattīrṇetyādau
GS24paribhsu:252_1: dhātutakārasya na natvam / tadantetyaṃśānupasthitāvapi tadādītyaṃśasyopasthitau repha-dāntātparasya
GS24paribhsu:253_1: 'dṛṣattīrṇaḥ' ityādau doṣaḥ syādeva /“syatāsī ḷluṭoḥ“ityādau ḷluṭoḥ parayorityarthe
GS24paribhsu:254: anvayānna tadantavijhiḥ/ 'ṅyābhyaḥ' ityādau tu na doṣaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:255_0: tatra kasmāditi niyatāvadhyākāṅkṣāyā abhāvena pañcamyantasya pratyayaviśeṣaṇatvābhāvāt /
GS24paribhsu:255_1: aṅga saṃjñā sūtre tu tadādeḥ pratyaye para ityarthe pañcamyantasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ spaṣṭameva /
GS24paribhsu:256: nanvevam 'kumārī brāmhaṇīrūpā' ityādau 'gharūpa' iti hrasvāpattirata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:259: “hṛdayasya hṛllekhayaṇlādeśeṣu“ityatra lekhagrahaṇāt/ tatra lekheti na ghañantam,
GS24paribhsu:260: anabhighānāt/ iyaṃ ca 'hṛdayasya' iti sūtra eva bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:265: viṣayasaptamīyam/ yaḥ strīpratyayaḥ striyaṃ prādhānyenā'ha tatra tadādiniyamo na,
GS24paribhsu:266_0: yastvaprādhānyenā'ha tatra tadādiniyamo 'styevetyarthaḥ / pratyāsatyā yasya samudāyastrīpratyayāntatvamāneyaṃ
GS24paribhsu:266_3: tadādāniyamābhāvena hrasva siddhiḥ / ata evātra paribhāṣāyāṃ na śāstrīyamupasarjanatvam,
GS24paribhsu:270: sūtre bhāṣye/ iyaṃ ca vācanikyeva/ 'ṣyaṅaḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:271: nanvevam“taraptamapau ghaḥ“ityādinā tarabantādeḥ saṃjñā syādata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:274: “sūptiṅantam“ityantagrahaṇamasyāṃ jñāpakam/ na ca pratyayayoḥ padasaṃjñāyāmapi pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā tadantagrahaṇābhāvāt jñāpite 'pi phalābhāva iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:275: padasaṃjñāyāḥ 'svādiṣu' iti viṣaye prakṛti niṣṭatayā padagrahaṇasya pratyayamātragrahaṇatvābhāvāt/“suptiṅantam“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā //
GS24paribhsu:276: nanu 'avatapte nakulasthitam' ityādau nakulasthita śabdasya ktāntatvābhāvāt samāso na syādata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:279_0: asyāśca karmaṇi ktānta uttarapade 'nantaro gatiḥ prakṛtisvara ityarthake 'gatiranantaraḥ'
GS24paribhsu:279_1: iti sūtre anantara grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam / taddhi 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādāvativyāpti vāraṇārtham /
GS24paribhsu:280: aprāptau tadvyarthaṃ sadasyā jñāpakam/ na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādau paratvāt 'gatirgatau' ityanenābhernighāta eveti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:282_0: padātparatvābhāvena ca tadaprāpteḥ / anantaragrahaṇe kṛtetu tatsāmartyād gatyākṣiptadhātunirūpitamevenantaryaṃ
GS24paribhsu:282_1: gṛhyata iti na doṣaḥ / na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādāvabhinā samāse 'nantarasyodaḥ pūrvapadatvābhāve
GS24paribhsu:282_2: 'pi svarārthaṃ taditi vācyam / 'kārakād datta' iti sūtre 'kārakāt' iti yogaṃ vibhajya
GS24paribhsu:282_3: tatra gati grahaṇamanuvartya kārakādeva paraṃ gatipūrvapadaṃ
GS24paribhsu:284_0: śabdāt tadasamabhivyāhṛtasya kevalasyāpīti tadarthaḥ / anyathānayā kṛdgrahaṇaviṣaye
GS24paribhsu:284_1: paratvāt 'pratyayagrahaṇa' paribhāṣāyā bādha eva syādityapi grahaṇam / ata eva 'sāṅkūṭinam'
GS24paribhsu:284_2: iti 'gatikārakopapadānām' iti 'kṛdgrahaṇa' iti ca paribhāṣābhyāṃ kṛdantena samāse
GS24paribhsu:285_0: na tu 'saṅkauṭinam' iti 'puṃyogāt' iti sūtre bhāṣyoktaṃ saṅgacchate anyathā tatra
GS24paribhsu:285_1: kevalakūṭinnityetasyāpīnuṇantatvāttato 'ṇi pākṣikadoṣo durvāra eva syāt / spaṣṭaṃ
GS24paribhsu:285_3: tu gateḥ pūrvapadasya ktānta uttarapade pare kāryavidhānāttatsamavadhāne 'pi kevalasya
GS24paribhsu:285_4: ktāntatvena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam / iyaṃ ca kṛdviśeṣagrahaṇe kṛtsāmānyagrahaṇe ca,
GS24paribhsu:286: na tu kṛdakṛdgrahaṇa iti/ 'anupasarjanāt' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:288: padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca tadantasya ca // Paribh_28 //
GS24paribhsu:289: padamaṅgaṃ ca viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇena ca tadanta vidhiḥ/ tena 'iṣṭakacitam, pakveṣṭakacitam' ityādau
GS24paribhsu:294: ata eva 'taduttarapadasya' iti pāṭho 'yukta iti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ atra padaśabdenottarapadādhikāraḥ,
GS24paribhsu:299: nanvevam 'asyāpatyamiḥ' ityādāvadantaprātipadikābhāvādiñ na syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:302: nimittasadbhāvāt viśiṣṭo 'padeśo mukhyo vyavahāro yasyāsti sa vyapadeśī/ yastu vyapadeśahetvabhāvādavidyamānavyapadeśo 'sahāyaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:304: kāryaṃ pratītyekasminnasahāye 'pi tatkāryaṃ kartavyamityarthaḥ/ tenākārasyāpyadantatvānna kṣatiḥ/ ekasminnityukteḥ 'sabhāsannayane' ākārasya nāditvam,
GS24paribhsu:305_1: 'tta syāt / ata eva 'hariṣu' ityādau soḥ padatvaṃ na / loke 'pi bahuputrasatve naikasmin
GS24paribhsu:308: kintvekaputrasatva eva/ anena aśāstrīyasyāpyatideśaḥ/ ata eva 'iyāya' ityādāvekāctvanibandhana dvitva siddhiḥ/ ata eva 'bhavati' ityādau 'bhū' ityasyāṅgatvam,
GS24paribhsu:309: 'iyān' ityādau kāryakālapakṣe taddhitāntatvanibandhanaprātipadikatvañca siddhyati/ anyathā yasmādvihitastadāditvābhāvānna syāt/
GS24paribhsu:314: tasya 'ekapadā ṛk' ityatra bhāṣyoktarītyā mukhyavyavahāra satvāt/“ekapadā ṛk' ityatrārthena yukto
GS24paribhsu:315: vyapadeśaḥ“iti bhāṣye uktam/ ṛktvāderarthaśabdobhayavṛttitvena tasyāḥ śabdamātrarūpaṃ padameko 'vayava ityartha iti tadāśayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:317: yathā ca 'śilāputrakasya śarūram' ityādevekasminnaropitānekakāvasthābhiḥ samudāyarūpatvādyāropeṇaitasya śarūramityādivyavahāraḥ,
GS24paribhsu:321: śapamādāyāṅgatve kārye yasmādvihitastadāditvetasya sasahāyatvābhāvālloke vijātīyakanyādisatve 'pyekaputrasya tasminnevayameva jyeṣṭha ityādivyavahāravat/
GS24paribhsu:322: na caivam 'nijau catvāra ekācaḥ' iti bhāṣyāsaṅgatiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:325: arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāva ityatrārthavatpadenāpyasahāyatvamupalakṣyate/ arthabodhakena śabdena vyapadeśisadṛśo bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ labhyata iti tadarthaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:326: prāyo 'sahāya evārthavatvāt/ 'kurute' ityādau taśabdākāro 'cāmantya iti vyavahāre sa
GS24paribhsu:327: ādiryasyeti vyavahāre cāsahāya eveti tatra vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṭisaṃjñāsiddhirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:328: nanu gargādibhyo vihita yañ tadanta vidhinā paramagargādibhyo 'pi syāt, ata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:331: iyaṃ ca 'samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedha ugidvarṇagrahaṇavarjam' iti vārtikasthapratyayāṃśānuvādaḥ/ ata eva
GS24paribhsu:332: 'yena vidhiḥ' iti sūtra bhāṣye pratyayavidhibhinne“aptṛn“ityādau gṛhyamāṇaprātipadikenāpi tadanta vidhipratipādanam 'svasā,
GS24paribhsu:333_0: paramasvasā' ityādyudāharaṇañca saṅgacchate / ata eva ca tadantavidhisūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:333_1: samāsetyādiniṣedhasya kathanavadasya na kathanam / so 'pi niṣedho viśiṣya tattadrūpeṇa
GS24paribhsu:335: atra ca jñāpakam“sapūrvācca“iti sūtram/ anyathā“pūrvādiniḥ“ityatra tadantavidhinaiva siddhe kiṃ tena//
GS24paribhsu:336: nanvevam“sūtrāntāṭṭhak” “daśāntāḍḍaḥ” “ekagopūrvāt“ityādeḥ kevala sūtraśabda daśanśabdaikaśabdādiṣvapi pravṛttirvyapadeśivadbhāvāt syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:339: “pūrvātsapūrvādiniḥ“ityekayoga eva kartavye pṛthag yogakaraṇamasyā jñāpakam/ na ca“iṣṭādibhyaḥ“iti sūtre 'nuvṛtyarthaṃ tathā pāṭhaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:343: ata eva“nāntādasaṅkhyādeḥ“iti caritārtham/ anyathā 'pañcamaḥ' ityādāvapi vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24paribhsu:346_0: na tu prātipadikāprātipadikagrahaṇe / tena“ugitaśca“ityatra na doṣa iti tatraiva
GS24paribhsu:346_1: bhāṣye spaṣṭam / iyam 'grahaṇavatā' iti ca paribhāṣā prātyayavidhiviṣayaiveti 'asamāse
GS24paribhsu:347: tena 'ahan' ityādeḥ paramāhanśabde kevalāhanśabde ca pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:348: nanu 'vānto yi' ityādau yādau pratyaya ityarthaḥ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:351: tadantavidherapavāda iyam/ vācanikyeṣā“yena vidhiḥ“ityatra bhāṣye paṭhitā/ asyāśca svarūpasatī saptamī nimittam/ ata eva“neḍvaśi kṛti“ityādau vaśādeḥ kṛta ityādyarthalābhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:352_1: saptamyantatva eva pravartate / tena“ḍaḥ si dhuṭ“ityādau sādeḥ parasyeti nārthaḥ /“tīṣasaha”
GS24paribhsu:357_2: sūtrasthaṃ bahuvacanasyeti grahaṇamasyā jñāpakam / taddhīdam“tiṣyapunarvasu“ityatra tadvyāvṛtyartham /
GS24paribhsu:358: na caivamapyatra“jātiraprāṇinām“iti nityaikavadbhāvena bahuvacanābhāvādidaṃ sūtraṃ vyarthamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:359: tadvaikalpikatvasyāpyanena jñāpanāt/ na caite prāṇina iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:360: “āpomayaḥ prāṇaḥ“iti śruteradbhirvinā glāyamānaprāṇānāmeva prāṇitvāta/ spaṣṭam cedam“tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:361: ata eva“dvandvaśca prāṇī“ityādeḥ prāṇyaṅgādīnāmeva samāhāra iti viparītaniyamo na //
GS24paribhsu:364_1: sūtre veti yogavibhāgena caiṣā sādhitā / tena“pratīpamanya ūrmiryudhyati“ityādi siddham /
GS24paribhsu:365: nanu kṣiya ityādāviyaṅ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:368: kṣiya itīyaṅ nirdeśo 'syā jñāpakaḥ/ tatreva prātipadikatva nibandhana vibhaktikaraṇādanityā ceyamiti“kṣiyo dīrghāt“ita sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:369: nanu“rāmau“ityādau vṛddhau kṛtāyāṃ kāryakāla pakṣe kathaṃ padatvam?
GS24paribhsu:373: ananyavadityasyānyavannetyarthaḥ/ tatrānyasādṛśyaniṣedhe 'nyatvābhāvaḥ sutarām/ ata eva tādṛśādarthabodhaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:374: anyathā śaktatāvacchedakaimupūrvyajñānāt tato bodho na syāt/
GS24paribhsu:375: evañca rāniti māntasya yasmād vihitastatvam, au ityasya parādivatvena suptvamiti tadāditadantatvam
GS24paribhsu:377: chinnapucche śuni śvatvavyavacahāravanmānte tatvaṃ lokanyāya siddham/ ata eva“prāgdīvyata“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:380: etenāyaṃ nyāyaḥ śāstrīyakārya eva śāstrīvikāra evetyapāstam/ vikṛtāvayava nibandhana kārye tu nāyam,
GS24paribhsu:385_2: siddhiḥ / spaṣṭaṃ ca kvacinnyāyāpravṛttiḥ“prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ“ityatra kaiyaṭena
GS24paribhsu:391: pūrvātparaṃ balavat, vipratiṣedha śāstrāt, pūrvasyaparaṃ bādhakamiti yāvat//
GS24paribhsu:392: nanvevam 'bhindhi' ityatra paratvāt tātaṅā bādhito dhirna syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:395: nanvevam 'tisṛṇām' ityatra paratvāt tisrādeśe punastrayādeśaḥ syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:397: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitameva // Paribh_39 //
GS24paribhsu:398: tatra kvaciccaritārthayorekasmin yugapadubhayoḥ kāryayorasambhavena bādhakābhāvāt paryāyeṇa tṛjādivacchāstra
GS24paribhsu:400: yathā tulyabalayorekaḥ preṣyo bhavati/ sa tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryaṃ karoti,
GS24paribhsu:401: yadā tamubhau yugapat preṣayato nānādikṣu ca kārye tadobhayorna karoti,
GS24paribhsu:402: yaugapadyāsambhavāt/ tathā śāstrayorlakṣyārthayoḥ kvacillakṣye yaugapadyena pravṛtyasambhavādapratipattau praptāyāmidaṃ paravidhyartham/ tatra kṛte yadi pūrvaprāptirasti,
GS24paribhsu:403: tarhi tadapi bhavatyeveti 'punaḥ prasaṅgavijñāna' siddhiriti“vipratiṣedha“sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:404_0: yattu kaiyaṭādayo vyaktau padārthe pratilakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇopaplavādubhayorapi śāstrayostattallakṣyayoracaritārthyena
GS24paribhsu:404_1: paryāyeṇa dvayorapi prāptau parameveti niyamārthamidamiti 'sakṛdgati' nyāyasiddhiḥ /
GS24paribhsu:405_0: jātipakṣe tūddeśyatāvacchedakākrānte kvacillakṣye caritārthayordvayoḥ śāstrayoḥ satpratipakṣanyāyena
GS24paribhsu:406: tanna ; vyaktipakṣe sarvaṃ lakṣyaṃ śāstraṃ vyāpnoti na jātipakṣa ityatra mānābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:407_1: bhāṣye darśanāt / ata eva“sarūpa“sūtre bhaṣye jātau padārthe 'navayavena sākalyena
GS24paribhsu:408: kiñca nahi bhāṣyokta tṛjādidṛṣṭāntasya vyaktivakṣa eva sarva viṣayatvam na dātipakṣa ityatra mānamasti/
GS24paribhsu:409: api ca vyaktipakṣe 'pyanyavyaktirūpa viṣayalābhena caritārthayoriyaṃ vyaktivirodhāt svaviṣayakatvaṃ na
GS24paribhsu:414: kvacillaukikadṛṣṭāntāśrayaṇamiti bhāṣyasammata mārga eva yukta iti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:415: dvayoḥ kāryayoryaugapadyenāsambhava eva vipratiṣedha śāstropayogī/ idam“iko guṇa“iti sūtre kaiyaṭe
GS24paribhsu:417: yathā 'śiṣṭāt' ityādau tātaṅśībhāvayoryugapatpravṛttau svasvanimittanantaryāsambhavaḥ/ yadyapi tātaṅādeḥ sthānivadbhavenāsthyeva tat,
GS24paribhsu:421_0: yadāgamā ityasya numpravṛtyuttaraṃ pravṛttaḥ / evam 'bhindhi' ityatra tātaṅdhibhāvayoryugapadekasthānisambandhasyāṅgarūpanimittānantaryasya
GS24paribhsu:423_1: pūrvameva bhavati / tena sarve pūrva vipratiṣedhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti“svaritena“iti sūtre
GS24paribhsu:424: nanvevam 'edhate' ityādau paratvāt vikaraṇe“anudāttaṅitaḥ“ityādi niyamānupapattiḥ, tena vyavadhānāt,
GS24paribhsu:428_0: atra“vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ“iti sūtreṇa sye vibhāṣātaṅvidhānaṃ jñāpakam / anyathā svavyavadhāne
GS24paribhsu:428_1: niyamāpravṛttau sāmānya śāstreṇobhayasiddhau vikalpavidhānaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt / atrārthe
GS24paribhsu:428_2: jñapite tu 'sya' iti tatra viṣayasaptamī bodyeti“anudāttaṅitaḥ“ityatra bhāṣyakaiyaṭayoḥ spaṣṭam /
GS24paribhsu:429: vikaraṇavyavadhāne 'pi niyamapravṛtteridaṃ jñapakamiti“śadeḥ śitaḥ“ityatra bhāṣye dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:430: vastuto 'smājjñāpakāt“anudāttaṅitaḥ“ityādiprakaraṇaṃ tibādividhyekavākyatayā vidhāyakam/ tatra“dhātoḥ“iti vihita pañcamī,
GS24paribhsu:432: evañca lāvasthāyāṃ sye 'pi tadvyavadhāne taṅsiddhiḥ/ śabādibhyastu pūrvameva niyamaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:434: lakāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt syādayo bahiraṅgā iti digyogalakṣaṇapañcamyāmapi na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:435: atra pakṣe“vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ“iti sūtraṃ syaviṣaya iti vyākhyayam/ ātmane pada śabdādau bhavisaṃjñā'śrayaṇīyeti tatvam/
GS24paribhsu:436: bhinnavākyatayā sāmānya śāstravihitānāṃ niyame tu lugādineva niyamena jātinivṛttiraṅgīkāryā/“bhuktavantaṃ prati mā bhukthā iti brūyāt,
GS24paribhsu:437: kiṃ tena kṛtaṃ syāt“iti nyāyastu nātra śāstra āśrayituṃ yuktaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:438: niyamādi śāstrāṇāṃ vaiyarthyāpatteḥ/ dhvanitaṃ cedam“sthane 'ntaratamaḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:439: śāstrānarthakyaṃ tu vṛddhisaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣyetiraskṛtam/ sāmānyaśāstreṇotpattistu sarūpasūtrasttha kaiyaṭa rītyā pradhānānurodhena guṇabhedakalpanā tāvatprakṛti kalpanayā kāryā,
GS24paribhsu:440: pratyayanivṛttau ca tatkalpitaprakṛterapi nivṛttiḥ kalpyeti gauravamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:448: ata eva 'tudati' ityādau parādapi guṇānnityatvāt śapratyayādirbhavati//
GS24paribhsu:453: idaṃ 'śadeḥ śitaḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ tatra hi 'nyaviśata' ityatra vikaraṇe kṛte tadantasyāḍ,
GS24paribhsu:462: yadā tu śāstravyatirekeṇa tadvidheyakāryayoreva nityatvādi vicāro yadāpi vyaktiviśeṣāśrayaṇābhāvaḥ, tadāha :-
GS24paribhsu:465: kṛte dvitīye nityatvenābhimatasya punaḥ prasaṅgamātraṃ nityatvavyavahāre prayojakam,
GS24paribhsu:466: na tu bādhakābādhita phalopahita prasaṅgo 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:469: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityam // Paribh_47 //
GS24paribhsu:470: kvacittu bādhakābādhita phalopahita prasaṅga eva gṛhyate tadāha :-
GS24paribhsu:472: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate tadapyanityam // Paribh_48/./
GS24paribhsu:473: saptame kaiyaṭenaitadupaṣṭambhakaṃ lokavyavahāradvayamudāhṛtam/ vālisugrīvayoryudhyamānayorbhagavatā vālini hate 'pi sugrīvasya vālitaḥ prābalyaṃ na vyavaharanti,
GS24paribhsu:474: bhagavatsahāyaiḥ pāṇḍavairjaye labdhepi pāṇḍavānāṃ prābalyaṃ vyavaharanti ceti
GS24paribhsu:479: iti paṭhyate/ yatra tvekasyaiva kāryasya paratvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca,
GS24paribhsu:480: tatrecchayānyatarattadubhayaṃ vā tasya balavatve niyāmakamullekhyam/ ata eva tatra paratvānnityatvācceti bhāṣye ucyate/
GS24paribhsu:481_0: vastutastatra paratvādityuktirekadeśinaḥ / spaṣṭaṃ cedaṃ vipratiṣedha sūtre kaiyaṭe /“ṇaucaṅi“iti
GS24paribhsu:481_2: bhāṣya uktam / evaṃ nityāntaraṅgayorbalavatvamapi yaugapadyāsambhava eveti bodyam //
GS24paribhsu:487: antarbhūtānyaṅgāni nimittāni yasya tadantaraṅgam/ evaṃ tadīyanimittasamudāyād bahirbhatāṅgakaṃ bahiraṅgam/ etacca“kharavasānoḥ“iti sūtre“asiddhavat
GS24paribhsu:488: sūtre ca bhāṣyakaiyaṭayoḥ spaṣṭam/ atrāṅga śabdena śabdarūpaṃ nimittameva gṛhyate,
GS24paribhsu:489: śabdaśāstre tasyaiva pradhānatvāt/ tena arthanimittakasya na bahiraṅgatvam/ ata eva“na tisṛcatasṛ“iti niṣedhaścaritārthaḥ/ anyathā
GS24paribhsu:491: ata eva 'trayādeśe srantasya pratiṣedhaḥ' iti“sthānivat“sūtrastha bhāṣyavārtikādi saṅgacchate/
GS24paribhsu:493: 'paceran' ityādāveyādīnāmaṅgasaṃjñāsāpekṣatvena bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvād valilopo na syāditi parāstam/ eyādeśāderaparanimittakatvenāntaraṅgatvācca/
GS24paribhsu:498: na śabdhamāśritya guṇa ityantaraṅgatvād guṇa eva syādityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:499: atra kaiyaṭaḥ/ siverbāhulakādauṇādike na pratyaye guṇavalopoṭhāṃ prasaṅge ūṭhapavādatvād valopaṃ bādhate,
GS24paribhsu:500_2: tatra kṛte yaṇ guṇau prapnuta iti /
GS24paribhsu:503: tadantavidhāvapi bahupadārthāpekṣatvarūpa bahiraṅgatvasya guṇe satvena tatra doṣakathanaparabhāṣyāsaṅgateḥ/
GS24paribhsu:504: bahiraṅgantaraṅgaśabdābhyāṃ bahvapekṣatvālpāpekṣatvayoḥ śabdamaryādayālābhācca/ tathā satyasiddhaṃ bahvapekṣamalpāpekṣa ityeva vadet/
GS24paribhsu:507: tvadrītyā tadapi vaktumucitam/ prathamyāt tadeva vā vaktumucitam/ mama tvantaraṅgaparibhāṣayā tadvāraṇāsambhavt tannoktam/
GS24paribhsu:509: guṇastu yaṇā bādhitatvādanityaḥ/ ūnaśabdamāśrityetyādi bhāṣyāsaṅgatyā cintyam/
GS24paribhsu:510: vali lope 'ntaraṅgaparibhāṣā na pravartata iti tu na yuktam/ tatsūtre bhāṣya eva vraścādiṣu lopātiprasaṅgamāśaṅkyopadeśasāmarthyānna/
GS24paribhsu:513: yattu nalopasya ṣaṭsaṃjñāyāmasiddhatvāt 'pañca' ityatra“na ṣaṭ“iti niṣedha iti, taccincyam/
GS24paribhsu:517: niṣedhastu striyāṃ yatprāpnoti, tanneti vyākhyānasāmarthyena bhūtapūrvaṣaṭtvamādāyeti bhodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:518_0: ata eva kṛtitugrahaṇaṃ caritārtham / 'vṛtrahabhyām' ityādau padatvanimittakatve 'pi
GS24paribhsu:518_1: nalopasya bahiraṅgatvābhāvāt / bhyāmaḥ padasaṃjñānimittatve 'pi nalopasya tannimittakatvābhāvāt /
GS24paribhsu:518_2: paramparayā nimittatvamādāya bahiraṅgatvāśrayaṇaṃ tu na mānam / dhvanitaṃ cedam“nalopaḥ
GS24paribhsu:520: antaraṅge kartavye jātaṃ tatkālaprāptikaṃ ca bahiraṅgamasiddhamityarthaḥ/ vraścādiṣu padasaṃskāra pakṣe samānakālatvameva dvayoriti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:521: etena 'antaraṅgaṃ bahiraṅgād balīyaḥ' iti paribhāṣāntaramityapāstam/ enāmāśritya 'vipratiṣedha' sūtre bhāṣye tasyāḥ pratyākhyānācca/
GS24paribhsu:524_0: tripādyā asiddhatvāt / asyāñca“vāha ūṭh“sūtrasthamūṭh grahaṇaṃ jñāpakamityeṣā sapādasaptādyāyīsthā /
GS24paribhsu:524_2: ityādisiddhestadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva / satyāṃ hyetasyāṃ bahiraṅgasamprasāraṇasyāsiddhatvāllaghūpadhahuṇo na syāt /
GS24paribhsu:525: na ca“puganta“iti sūtre nimittamiko viśeṣaṇam, ata eva 'bhinatti' ityādau na guṇaḥ/ evaṃ
GS24paribhsu:528: “puganta“ityādau karmadhārayāśrayaṇena pratyayaparāṅgāvayavalaghūpadhārūpeko guṇa iti“ikoguṇavṛddhī“iti sūtra bhāṣya
GS24paribhsu:531: vāryūherityādi tu 'ūhateḥ' kvipi bodhyam/ dhātūnāmanekārthatvānnārthāsaṅgatiḥ/ 'prauhaḥ' ityādyasādhveva,
GS24paribhsu:536: na cānayā pūrvasyāsiddhatvādabhāvena taṃ prati parāsiddhatvaṃ pūrvatretyanena vaktumaśakyamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:538_0: kiñca pūrvatretyasya pratyakṣatvena tenānumānikyā asyā bādha evocitaḥ / ataḥ kāryakāla
GS24paribhsu:538_2: visarjanīyasūtrabhāṣye siddhāntinā / tripādīsthe 'ntaraṅge kartavye parihāro na yukta
GS24paribhsu:539: ata eva“nigālyate“ityādau latvārtham 'tasya doṣaḥ' iti vacanamevārabdham/ anyathāntaraṅgatvāt
GS24paribhsu:542_0: te 'pi lakṣaṇaikacakṣurbhirnā'dartavyeti dik / ata eva“omāṅośca“ityāṅgrahaṇaṃ caritārtham /
GS24paribhsu:542_1: taddhi“khaṭvā ā ūḍhaḥ“ityatra paramapi savarṇadīrghaṃ bādhitvāntaraṅgatvād guṇe kṛte
GS24paribhsu:542_3: paścāt 'khaṭvā' śabdasya samudāyena yogāt guṇasyāntaraṅgatvamiti“samprasāraṇācca“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:547: yattu“pūrvaṃ dhāturupasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhamema/ upasargeṇa tatsaṃjñakaśabdena,
GS24paribhsu:548: sādhanena kārakeṇa tatprayuktakāryeṇa ca/ ata eva 'anubhūyate' ityādau sakarmakatvāt karmaṇi lakāra siddhiḥ' iti tanna,
GS24paribhsu:551: sādhyasya ca sādhanākāṅkṣatayā tatsambandhottarameva niścitakriyā bodhena sādhanakāryapravṛtyuttarameva kriyāyoganimittopasargasaṃjñakasya sambandhaucityāt/
GS24paribhsu:552: ata eva“suṭ kātpūrvaḥ“iti sūtre“pūrvaṃ dhāturupasargeṇa“ityuktvā 'naitat sāram,
GS24paribhsu:556_0: 'sādhanaṃ hi kriyāṃ nirvartayati' ityādinā bhāṣye / upasargadyotyārthāntarbhāveṇa
GS24paribhsu:556_1: dhātunaivārthābhidhānādukteṣu karmaṇi lakārādi siddhiḥ / paścācchotṛbodhāya dyotakopasarga sambandhaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:557: evañcāntaraṅgatarārthatopasarganimittaḥ suṭ sam -- kṛtītyavasthāyāṃ dvitvāditaḥ pūrvaṃ pravartate, tato dvitvādi/
GS24paribhsu:558: ata eva“praṇidāpayati“ityādau ṇatvam 'yadāgamāḥ' iti nyāyena samāhitaṃ bhāṣye/ ata eva 'pratyeti pratyayaḥ' ityādi siddhiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:559: yadupasarganimittakaṃ kāryamusargārthāśritaṃ viśiṣṭopasarganimittatvāt tadantaraṅgam/ yattu na tathā,
GS24paribhsu:560: tatra pūrvāgatasādhananimittakamevāntaraṅgam/ ata eva“na dhātu“iti sūtre“preddhaḥ“ityatra“guṇo bahiraṅgaḥ“iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:561_1: sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam / bhāvārthapratyayasyāpi pūrvamevotpattiḥ / ata eva“ṇeradhyayane“iti
GS24paribhsu:561_2: nirdeśaḥ saṅgacchate / idaṃ ca sāmānyāpekṣaṃ jñāpakam,
GS24paribhsu:562: bhāvatiṅo'pi pūrvamutpatteḥ/ anyathā tatra samāsāpattiḥ/ tiṅi tu 'atiṅ' iti niṣedhānna tatra doṣaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:564_1: yathā“rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke“ityatra rudāditvaṃ sārvadhātukatvaṃ ca / tatra sārvadhātukajñanāya
GS24paribhsu:565: pratyayatvajñānaṃ cāvaśyakamiti yāsuḍantaraṅgaḥ/ etena yat“anudāttaṅitaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭenoktam
GS24paribhsu:567: tatparāstam ; viśeṣāpekṣatve 'pi tasya sāmānyadharmanimittakatvābhāvena tatvasya durupapādatvāt,
GS24paribhsu:572: yattu matupsūtre bhāṣye“pañca gāvo yasya santi,
GS24paribhsu:577: ukte 'pi hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigostaddhito yathā 'pāñcanāpitiḥ' iti pūrvapakṣyuktirbhāṣye/“dvigorluganapatye“iti lugvidhānāt taddhitārthadvigostaddhito bhavati,
GS24paribhsu:578_1: 'pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ' ityādau sāvakāśadvigorbahuvrīhiṇā prakṛte paratvāt bādha
GS24paribhsu:579_0: bahuvrīhiḥ“iti siddhāntinokte tamavakāśamajānāno 'pavādatvād dviguḥ prāpnoti pūrvapakṣī /
GS24paribhsu:579_1: anyapadārthe subantamātrasya vidhīyamāna bahuvrīheḥ saṅkhyāyāstaddhitārthe vidhīyamāno
GS24paribhsu:583: tasmiṃścāsya taddhite 'stigrahaṇaṃ kriyate“iti/ adhikāstyarthāpekṣamatvarthanimitto dvigurbahiraṅga iti kaiyaṭa iti/
GS24paribhsu:589: ata eva subantasāmānyāpekṣo bahuvrīhiḥ, tadviśeṣāpekṣo dviguriti noktaṃ bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:592: kintvastiśabdānmatubarthamiti tvadabhimataṃ bahiraṅgatvamapi dvigornāstīti pratipādya siddhāntinā“matvarthe dvigoḥ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ“iti vacanenaitatsiddhamityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:593_0: ata eva“tadoḥ saḥ sāvanantyayoḥ“iti sūtre 'nantyayoriti caritārtham / anyathā pratyaya
GS24paribhsu:594: bhāṣyakaiyaṭayorapyetadantaraṅgatvābhāva eva sūcita iti sudhiyo vibhāvayantu/
GS24paribhsu:600_0: tataḥ sambandhinām“ / arthānāmapi jātivyaktiliṅgasaṃkhyākārakāṇāṃ bodhakramaḥ śāśtrakṛtkalpitaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:600_1: tatkrameṇaiva ca tadbodhakaśabdhapradurbhāvaḥ kalpita iti tatkrameṇaiva tatkāryāṇīti
GS24paribhsu:601: parayaṇādeśasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvādityanena“acaḥ parasmin“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:602: tadapi yugapatprāptau pūrvapravṛttiniyāmakameva/ yathā 'paṭvyā' ityatra padasya vibhajyānvākhyāne,
GS24paribhsu:606: ata eva vāyvorityādau valilopo yaṇaḥ sthānivatvena vāritaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:607: “acaḥ parasmin“ityatra bhāṣyakṛtā/ krameṇānvākhyāne tūktodāharaṇe pūrvapravṛttikatvamantaraṅgatvaṃ bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatvamapi nimittabhāvādaprāptirūpaṃ bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:608: yattu evaṃ rītyā pūrvasthānikamapyantaraṅgamiti, taccintyam, 'srajiṣṭhaḥ' ityādau vinmatorluki
GS24paribhsu:610: bhāṣyakṛtkṛtasya naiṣphalyāpatteḥ/ tvadukta rītyā vinmatorluko bahiraṅgāsiddhatvenānāyāsatastadvāraṇāt, bhāṣya
GS24paribhsu:612: iyaṃ cottarapadādhikārasthabahiraṅgasya nāsiddhatvabodhiketi“ica ekāco 'm“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:613: pūrvapakṣyuktiriti sā nādartavyā/“parantapaḥ“ityādāvanusvāre nāsiddhatvaṃ mumastripādyāṃ tadapravṛtteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:614: navya mate 'pi yathoddeśapakṣāśrayaṇenānyathāsiddhodāharaṇadānena tasya taduktitvamāvaśyakamityāhuḥ/ ābhīye 'ntaraṅge ābhīyasya bahiraṅgasya samānāśrayasya nānenāsiddhatvam,
GS24paribhsu:618: nanvevam 'akṣadyūḥ' ityādau bahiraṅgasyoṭho 'siddhatvādantaraṅgo yaṇ na syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:621_0: atra“ṣatvatukoḥ“iti sūtrasthaṃ tuggrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam / anyathā 'adhītya 'pretya' ityādau
GS24paribhsu:621_1: samāsottaraṃ lyappravṛtyā pūrvaṃ samāse jāte tatra saṃhitāyā nityatvād lyabutpattiparyantamapyasaṃhitaya'vasthānāsambhavena
GS24paribhsu:622: “padadvayasambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣaṃ bahiraṅgam“iti 'preddhaḥ' ityādau guṇo bahiraṅga iti granthena“na dhātu lopa“iti sūtre“saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ“iti sūtre ca bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:624: bahiraṅgasyaikādeśasyāsiddhatvena ṣatva pravṛttau kiṃ teneti/ tanna,
GS24paribhsu:625: iṇaḥ pūrvapadasambandhitvena ṣatvasyāpi padadvaya sambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣatvenobhayoḥ samatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:627: paribhāṣārthastu -- aco 'nyānantaryanimittake 'ntaraṅge kartavye jātasya bahiraṅgasya bahiṣṭva prakḷptiḥ/ bahiṣpadena bahiraṅgam,
GS24paribhsu:628: tasya bhāvo bahiraṅgatvam/ tatprayuktāsiddhatvasya na prakḷptiḥ, na prāptiriti/
GS24paribhsu:629_0: 'asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam' ityuktvā 'nājānantarya iti vakṣyāmi' iti bhāṣyāktyā tatratyasya
GS24paribhsu:629_1: antaraṅga ityasyānuvṛttisūcanāt / tena 'pacāvedam' ityādau na doṣaḥ / antaraṅgasyācsthānika
GS24paribhsu:630: 'jātasya bahiraṅgasya' ityuktyā 'ajaye indram' 'dhiyati' ityādau bahiraṅgadīrgha guṇāderasiddhatvaṃ siddham/
GS24paribhsu:632_1: caritārtham / taddhi 'śivaaāaiha' iti sthite paramapi savarṇadīrghaṃ bādhitvā dhātūpasargakāryatvenāntaraṅgatvād
GS24paribhsu:633: nanu“akṣadyūḥ“ityatra yaṇi kṛte ūṭho 'siddhatvād valilopāpattiriti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:634: aco 'nyānantaryanimittake 'ntaraṅge kartavye kṛte ca tasminyadantaraṅgaṃ prapnoti,
GS24paribhsu:635: tatra ca kartavye nāsiddhatvamiti tadarthāt/ asiddhaparibhāṣāyā anityatvena tadvāraṇe tvasyā vaiyarthyaṃ tenaiva siddheḥ/
GS24paribhsu:636_0: ata eva“na lopaḥ sup“iti sūtre kṛti tuggrahaṇaṃ caritārtham / anyathā 'vṛtrahabhyām'
GS24paribhsu:638: na caivaṃ sati“hrasvasyapiti“iti sūtrasya bhāṣyavirodhaḥ/ tatra hi 'grāmaṇi putraḥ' ityatra
GS24paribhsu:641: tena bhāṣyeṇāsyā anavakāśatvabodhanāt/ etajjñāpakena antaraṅgaparibhāṣāyā anityatvabodhanasyaiva nyāyyatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:642_0: ata eva“acaḥ parasmin“iti sūtre bhāṣye 'paṭu ī ā' ityatra parayaṇādeśasya anayāsiddhatvāt
GS24paribhsu:642_1: pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ sādhitaḥ / ata evaiṣā bhāṣye punaḥ kvāpi nollikhitā / ata eva antaraṅgaparibhāṣāmupakramya
GS24paribhsu:647: nanvevam 'gomatpriyaḥ' ityādau padadvayanimittakasamāśritatvena bahiraṅgaṃ lukaṃ bādhitvāntaraṅgatvāddhalṅyādilope numādayaḥ syuḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:649: antaraṅgānapi vidhīn bahiraṅgo lug bādhate // Paribh_52 //
GS24paribhsu:650: atra ca“pratyayottarapadayośca“iti sūtraṃ jñāpakam/ 'tvatkṛtam' ityādau lugapekṣayā antaraṅgatvād vibhaktinimittakena“tvamāvekavacane“ityanena siddha idaṃ vyarthaṃ sattajjñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:651: nanu 'tava putraḥ, tvatputraḥ' ityādau tavamamādibādhamārthaṃ tadāvaśyakamiti cet, evaṃ tarhyatratya
GS24paribhsu:652: maparyantagrahaṇānuvṛttistajjñāpiketi bhāṣyakṛtaḥ/ yuṣmadādibhya ācārakvip tu na,
GS24paribhsu:655: evamevaikārthakābhyāṃ pratipādikābhyāṃ prātipadikaṇico 'pyanabhidhānaṃ bodhyam/ etena tatrā'deśārthaṃ pratyayagrahaṇaṃ caritārthamityapāstam/
GS24paribhsu:656: nanu maparyantānuvṛttirapi sarvādeśatvavāraṇāya caritrthā/ 'na cotsargasamānādeśā apavādāḥ'
GS24paribhsu:657: iti nyāyenāsiddhavatsūtrasthabhāṣyasammatena maparyantasyaivādeśe siddhe tadanuvṛttirvyattheti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:663: ata eva“tasminnaṇi ca“ityanena yuṣmākādyādeśavidhānaṃ caritārtham, anyathā'kaṅādeśameva
GS24paribhsu:668: bhāṣyakārastu vināpi virodhaṃ satyapi sambhave bādhakatvamicchati,
GS24paribhsu:670: tathāpi yuṣmakādyā'deśavidhānajñāpita utsargaḥ svīkriyata eveti prakṛte na doṣaḥ/ etad bhāṣyamapi tatsvīkāre mānam/
GS24paribhsu:671_1: ca antaraṅgatvāt tvamāvityeva siddhe vyarthā saṃtajjñapikā / jñāpite tvasminnetadviṣaye
GS24paribhsu:671_2: tavādīnāmaprāptyā tadapavādatvābhāvena maparyantasyavā'deśārthaṃ sā caritārtheti tadāśayaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:672: yattu haradattenāntaraṅgapravṛttau pratyaya uttarapade ca maparyantāsambhavena tadanuvṛttirvyarthā satī jñapiketyuktam,
GS24paribhsu:675: vastuta idaṃ jñāpakaṃ vārtikarītyaiva, bhāṣyarītyā tu vācanika evāyamartha ityāhuḥ/
GS24paribhsu:676_0: iyam“supo dhātu“iti lugviṣayaiveti kecit /“eṅhrasvātsambuddheḥ” “na yāsayoḥ“iti sūtrasthākaraprāmāṇyena
GS24paribhsu:676_1: lugmātra viṣayā / ādye 'he trapu' ityādāvanena nyāyena lopaṃ bādhitvā lug bhavatīti bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:678: na tu sublugeva/ ata eva“sanīsraṃsaḥ“ityādau nalopo na bhavati/ 'pañcabhiḥ khaṭvābhiḥ krītaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:679: pañcakhaṭvaḥ' ityādāvekādeśāt prāgeva ṭāpo luk/ anyathā
GS24paribhsu:680: kṛtaikādeśasya lukyakāraśravaṇaṃ na syāditi kaiyaṭe uktam/
GS24paribhsu:681: etadvirodhād yat“tadrājasya“iti sūtre kaiyaṭenoktam ' aṅgānatikrānto 'tyaṅgaḥ' ityatra
GS24paribhsu:682_0: supoluki bahuvacana paratvābhāvāt “tadrājasya“iti lug na syāditi śaṅkāparabhāṣyavyākhyāvasare
GS24paribhsu:682_1: antaraṅgānapīti nyāyenāyaṃ luk subluko bādhakaḥ syādityāśaṅkya subluka evānena balavatvaṃ
GS24paribhsu:682_2: bodhyata iti tatprauḍhyeti draṣṭavyam / lugapekṣayā luko balavatvasya vaktumaśakyatvāditi
GS24paribhsu:683: anena nyāyenāntaraṅganimittavināśakalukastatprayojakasamāsādīnāṃ ca prābalyaṃ bodhyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:684: nanvevam saumendre 'ntaraṅgatvādādguṇe pūrvapadātparendraśabdābhāvena“nendrasyapaparasya“iti vṛddhiniṣedho vyarthaḥ/ antādivadbhāvastūbhayata āśrayaṇe niṣiddhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:689: anyathā 'khaṭvābhiḥ' ityādāvapi pūrvāntavatvenādantatve bhisa aisāpattiriti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:690: ata eva 'pūrveṣukāmaśamaḥ' ityādāvantaraṅgatvād guṇe vṛddhirnasyādityāśaṅkitam/ tadekadeśamātrasya vikārābhāvācca/ taduktaṃ bhāṣye 'indredvavacau,
GS24paribhsu:694: marudādibhirindrasya dvandve indrasyaiva pūrva nipātaḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:697: atra ca“nendrasya“iti niṣedha eva jñāpaka iti“antādivacca” “vipratiṣedhe param“iti
GS24paribhsu:699: nanvevamapi 'pradhāya, prasthāya' ityādāvantaraṅgatvādvitvādiṣu kṛteṣu lyap syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:702: “ado jagdhiḥ“iti sūtre ti kitītyeva siddhe lyabgrahaṇamasyā jñapakamiti“ado jagdhiḥ“ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:703: nanvevamapi“iyāya“ityādau dvitve kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatve tadasiddhirata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:709: 'yenanāprāpti' nyāyena 'iyati' ityādisakalalakṣya prāpta yaṇapavādatvasyaiva nirṇayāditi prāñcaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:711: na ca 'iyāya' 'iyeṣa' ityādau caritārtham, tayorapi pūrvapravṛttaguṇasya pūrvapravṛttavṛddheśca
GS24paribhsu:712: “dvirvacaneci“iti rūpātideśenāpahāre dvitve kṛte punaḥ prāpte guṇavṛddhī bādhitvāntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrdhāpatteḥ/ na ca 'iyati' ityādau taccaritārtham,
GS24paribhsu:714: sāhacaryād vyākhyānācca ṛdhātoreva grahaṇam/ ataḥ ivarṇasyeyaṅityarthaḥ/ “abhyāsasyātau“iti
GS24paribhsu:722: antye dvitīyadvirvacanasyaiva satvena tvadukta prayogasyaiva durlabhatvāt/ evañca sampūrṇa sūtrasya jñāpakatā yuktā/
GS24paribhsu:723: yadyapi bhāṣye 'yadayamabhyāsasyāsavarṇa ityasavarṇagrahaṇaṃ karoti' iti granthenāsavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva
GS24paribhsu:725: tathāpi 'na hyantareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparābhyāso bhavati' iti tadupapādana granthena sampūrṇa sūtrasyaiva jñāpakatā labhyate/
GS24paribhsu:727: atyarthametat syāt' ityanena sūtra sārthakyameva darśitam/ asavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva jñāpakatve tu tadvyāvartyapradarśanena tat sārthakyameva darśitaṃ syāt/
GS24paribhsu:728: na ca 'akṛtavyūha' paribhāṣayā 'iyeṣa' ityādau savarṇadīrdhāprāptiḥ, yadi dīrdhonasyāt, tarhi
GS24paribhsu:729: guṇaḥ syāditi sambhāvanāyāḥ satvena paribhāṣāpravṛtteḥ sūpapādatvāditi kathaṃ sampūrṇa sūtrasya jñāpakateti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:730: tasyā asatvāt/ satve vaitadbhāṣyaprāmāṇyena yatrāntaraṅgakāryapravṛttiyogyakālottarameva tannimittavināśaka bahiraṅgavidheḥ praptiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:732: na cāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhopi 'iyāya' ityādau pūrvāntavatvenābhyāsatvādivarṇatvācca ṇalyasavarṇa iyaṅvidhānena sūtraṃ caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:734: vṛddhibādhanārthatvāditi vācyam/ pratyāsatyāsavarṇa padena abhyāsottarakhaṇḍasambandhyasavarṇāca eva grahaṇāt,
GS24paribhsu:743: tatra kartavye vṛddhyādeḥ sthānivatvena 'asavarṇe' iti pratiṣedhāditi vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:744: sūtrārambhasāmarthyādeva stthānivatvāpravṛtteḥ/ tacca sāmānyāpekṣam/ abhyāsakārye taduttarakhaṇḍādeśasya tatkāryapratibandhakībhūtaṃ sthānivatvaṃ neti/
GS24paribhsu:745: ata eva 'ārati' ityādau yaṇādeśasya sthānivatvādabhyāsasya“ḍhralope“iti dīrdho durlabha ityapāstam/ dīrghavidhau tanniṣedhācca/
GS24paribhsu:748: 'iyañcāṅgasambandhinyāṅga eva' iti“svarito vā“iti sūtre bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'kumāryai' ityādo yaṇuttaramāḍuktaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:749: iyañcānityā 'chvoḥ' iti satugnirdeśāt/ anyathāntaraṅgatvāt pūrvaṃ tukaḥ śādeśe tuko 'prāptyā tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭamevetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:751: tataḥ samprasāraṇe 'pīṭaḥ śravaṇāpattiriti cet, atra kecit--
GS24paribhsu:755: śāstrapravṛttiviṣayo yairityarthaḥ/ bhāvi nimittavināśa ityadyāhāraḥ/ bahiraṅgeṇāntaraṅgasya nimittavināśe paścāt sambhāvite 'ntaraṅgaṃ neti yāvat/
GS24paribhsu:756: atra ca - jñāpakam,“samarthānāṃ prathamāt“iti sūtre samarthānāmiti/ taddhi sūtthitādibhyaḥ
GS24paribhsu:757: kṛtadīrghebhyaḥ pratyayotpatyartham/ anyathāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhe kṛta eva pratyayaprāptyā tadvyarthatā spaṣṭa eva/
GS24paribhsu:758: na cātraikādeśapravṛtti samaye vṛddhyaprāptyaikādeśe kṛta ādeśe vṛddheḥ praptāvapi tannimittavināśābhāva iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:760: na ca sautthitau bahiraṅgatayā vṛddherasiddhatvānna tannimittavināśa iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:763: yattu samarthagrahaṇenāntaraṅgaparibhāṣāyā anityatvameva jñāpyata iti/ tanna,
GS24paribhsu:764: asiddha paribhāṣāyā samakālaprāpta bahiraṅgasya pūrvaṃ jātabahiraṅgasya cāntaraṅge kartavye 'siddhatvaṃ bodhyate,
GS24paribhsu:765: na tu jāte 'ntaraṅge tasya tatva bodhyate,
GS24paribhsu:768: etat pravṛttau ca nimittavināśasambhāvanāpi nimittam/ ata eva 'gomaddaṇḍī' ityādau halṅyādi lopo na/
GS24paribhsu:769: anyathā halṅyādi lopa kāle sāmāsika luko 'prāptyā taduttaraṃ cāpahāryābhāvādaprāptyā lopasyaivāpatteḥ/ asti cātrāpi 'yadi lopo na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:772_2: iti vadan 'na kṛto vyūhaḥ viśiṣṭastarko nimittakāraṇavināśe 'pi kāryasthitirūpo yaiḥ'
GS24paribhsu:773: lokanyāya siddhaścāyamarthaḥ/ tathā hi loke nimittaṃ dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭam--kāryasthito niyāmakaṃ tadaniyāmakaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:775: tannāśe dvitvanāśābhyupagamāt/ vedānti naye prārabdhasya vikṣepasthiti niyāmakatvaṃ ca prasiddhameva/
GS24paribhsu:776: dvitīyaṃ yathā daṇḍādi, tannāśe 'pi ghaṭanāśadarśanāt/ śāstre lakṣyānurodhād vyavasthā/
GS24paribhsu:777_0: bhāvinimittavināśe pūrvamanutpattau tu na kaścinnyāyaḥnāpi sampratipanno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:778_0: pare tu 'seduṣaḥ' ityādau padāvadhike 'nvākhyāne 'sed vas as' iti sthite iṭ samprasāraṇayoḥ
GS24paribhsu:778_1: praptau pratipadavidhitvāt pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe valāditvābhādiṭaḥ prāptireva neti
GS24paribhsu:781: tathāpi pūrvapravṛttau sāvakāśatve 'pi niyāmakaṃ bhavatyeveti tadāśayaḥ/ nirūpitaṃ caitad bahuśaḥ śabdenduśekharādau/
GS24paribhsu:782: “samarthānām“iti sūtrasthasamarthagrahaṇaṃ tu 'viṣuṇaḥ' ityādāvakṛtasandheḥ pratyayadarśanena sarvatra tathā bhramavāraṇāya nyāyasiddhārthānuvāda eva/
GS24paribhsu:783: dhvanitaṃ cedam“vipratiṣedha“sūtre bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'vaikṣamaṇiḥ' ityantaraṅga
GS24paribhsu:785: kiñca vibhajyānvākhyāne 'su utthita as i' it sthite 'vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ' iti prāpta vṛddhi
GS24paribhsu:787: ata eva“asiddhavat“sūtre 'vasusamprasāraṇamajvidhau siddhaṃ vaktavyam' 'papuṣaḥ' ityādau vasoḥ
GS24paribhsu:788: samprasāraṇe kṛte āto lopo yathā syāt' iti bhāṣye uktam/ padasya vibhajyānvākhyāne pūrvoktakaiyaṭarītyā pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe iṭoprāptāvusnimittaka evā'to lopa iti tadasaṅgatiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:790: bhāṣyakṛtā ca na pratyākhyātam/ pratyaṅgaṃ antaraṅgam/ asyāṃ paribhāṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tu tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:791_0: ata eva“chvoḥ“iti sūtre 'avaśyamatra tugabhāvārtho yatnaḥ kāryaḥ' antaraṅgatvāddhi
GS24paribhsu:791_1: tuk prāpnoti' iti bhāṣye uktam / etatsatve tu tuko 'prāptyā yatnāvaśyakatvakathanamasaṅgatamiti spaṣṭameva /
GS24paribhsu:794_0: kiñcaiṣā bhāṣye na dṛśyate / taduktam“asiddhavat“sūtre kaiyaṭena 'nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpyapāyaḥ'
GS24paribhsu:794_1: iti paribhāṣāyāḥ 'bhaṣyakṛtānāśrayaṇāt' iti / padasaṃskāra pakṣe 'hariḥ' ityādau visarge kṛte
GS24paribhsu:795: tato gacchatītyādi sambandhe 'hariḥ gacchati' ityādyeva sādhu/ tadviṣaye padasaṃskārapakṣānāśrayaṇaṃ veti dik//
GS24paribhsu:798: yena nāprāpte yo vidhirārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati // Paribh_57 //
GS24paribhsu:800: yena nāprāpta ityasya yatkartṛkāvaśyaprāptāvityarthaḥ/ nañ dvayasya prakṛtārthadārḍhyabodhakatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:803_0: tadaprāptiyogye 'cāritārthyaṃ hyetasya bādhakatve bhījam / ata eva“āyādayaḥ“iti sūtre
GS24paribhsu:804: na ca sati śapyasati vā na viśeṣaḥ/ anyādidānīmidamucyate--nāsti viśeṣa iti/ yaduktam“āyādīnāṃ syādibhiravyāpto 'vakāśa iti sa nāstyavakāśa“iti bhāṣye uktam/
GS24paribhsu:805: evamatra tatpravṛtyuttaraṃ cāritārthye 'pi tadavyāpto 'vakśo nāstīti samameva/
GS24paribhsu:806: kiñca tatpravṛtyuttaramapi cāritārthye tadbādhabodhanam/ anyathānavakāśatvenaiva bādhe siddhe etatkathanavaiyarthyāpatteḥ,
GS24paribhsu:808: dvitīyadvirvacanena bādhaḥ/ yathā vā'derapi pravṛtyā caritārthena 'ādeḥ parasya' ityanena 'alo 'ntyasya' ityasya bādhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:809: taduktam“midaco 'ntyāt“iti sūtre bhāṣye“satyapi sambhave bādhanaṃ bhavati“iti/ anyathā“brāmhaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatām,
GS24paribhsu:810: takraṃ kauṇḍinyāya“ityatra takradānena dadhidānasya bādho na syāt/ taddanottaraṃ tatpūrvaṃ vā taddanasya cāritārthyasambhavāt/ ata eva viṣayabhede 'pyapavādatvam/
GS24paribhsu:811: ata evācirādeśena nuṭo 'pyapavādatvāt bādhamāśaṅkya 'na tisṛ' iti jñāpakena samāhitam“tṛjvat” sūtre bhāṣye/ tena viṣayabhede 'pavādatvābhāva eva bodhyata iti kaścit,
GS24paribhsu:821: tasya bādhako bhavati ityevātra paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate//
GS24paribhsu:822: yattu 'dayaterdigi' iti sūtre dvitvottaraṃ digyādeśasya cāritārthyaṃ kaiyaṭenoktam, tat prauḍhyā/
GS24paribhsu:825: virodhasya tadbījatvāt“iti vārtikamataṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtā dūṣitatvānna lakṣyasiddhyupayogi/
GS24paribhsu:826: “takrakauṇḍinya“nyāyopi tadaprāptiyogye 'caritārthaviṣayo vidheyaviṣaya eva ceti“taddhiteṣvacāmādeḥ” “dhātorekācaḥ“ityādi sūtreṣu bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:827: kvacittu sarvathānavakāśatvādeva bādhakatvam/ yathā ṅerāmo yāḍādibādhakatvam/ na hi yāḍādiṣu kṛteṣu ṅerām prapnoti,
GS24paribhsu:828_0: nirdiśyamānasya vyavadhānāt / tatra svasya pūrvaṃ pravṛttirityeva teṣāṃ bādhaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:828_1: tatra bādhake pravṛtte yadyutsargaprāptirbhavati tadā bhavatyeva / yathā tatraiva
GS24paribhsu:829: yathā 'paceyuḥ' ityādau dīrghavādhake niravakāśa iyādeśe dīrghābhāvaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:833_0: apavādaśabdo 'tra bādhakaparaḥ / taduktam“guṇo yaṅlukoḥ“ityatra bhāṣye / abhyāsavikāreṣvapavādā
GS24paribhsu:834: anavakāśatvāditi granthena gaṇarūpābhyāsāntyaṇasyetvamityarthe halādiḥśeṣa tannivṛttau tadanavakāśam,
GS24paribhsu:836: antya halo 'bhāvāt/ abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāvena ca sādhitam/ tasmiṃśca sati lope kṛte sāmarthyācchiṣṭasyāntyasyetvamiti na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:837: na ca 'yena nāprāpti' nyāyenāpavādatvamapyasya suvacam, tasya caritārthaviṣayatāyā uktatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:838: “iko jhal“ityatra bhāṣyepi dhvanitametat/ tatra hi 'ajjhana' iti dīrdheṇa guṇottaraṃ phalābhāvenānavakāśatvād guṇo bādhite dīrghottaraṃ guṇaḥ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:839: dīrghavidhānaṃ tu minoterdīrdhe kṛte“sani mīmā“ityatra mīgrahaṇena grahaṇer'thavattatra paścāt praptaguṇabādhanārtham,
GS24paribhsu:840: “iko jhal“iti kitvamityuktam/ anyathāpavādatvena bādhe tadviṣaye utsargāpravṛtterbhāṣyasya sūtrasya cāsaṅgatiriti spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:843: “aṇaḥ karmaṇica“iti sūtrasthabhāṣyavirodhāt/ tatra hi 'aṇaḥ punarvacanamapavādaviṣaye 'nivṛtyartham' 'godāyo vrajati' ityādyuktam/
GS24paribhsu:845: atredaṃ bodhyam -- 'yenanāprapte' ityatra yenetyasya yadi svetareṇetyarthaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:846: tadā sva viṣaye svataradyadyat prāpnoti tad bādhyam,
GS24paribhsu:848: iyameva bādhyasāmānyacinteti vyavahriyate/ anavakāśatvena bādhe 'pyeṣā vaktuṃ śakyā yadyudāharaṇamasti, vinigamanāvirahāt/
GS24paribhsu:850: kāryeṇetyartho vā tadā bādhyaviśeṣacintā/ anavakāśatvena bādhe 'pyetadbādhena sārthakyam,
GS24paribhsu:853: tatra kāryeṇetyarthe pararūpatvavacchinne kātya ārabhyamāṇāyā vṛddhestadbādhakatve na nirṇīte kiṃ śāstravihitasyetyevaṃ tadviśeṣacintāyāmāha --
GS24paribhsu:855: purastādapavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante, nottarān // Paribh_59 //
GS24paribhsu:856_0: avaśyaṃ svaparasmin bādhanīye prathamopasthitānantarabādhena cāritārthye paścādupasthitasya
GS24paribhsu:856_1: tataḥ parasya bādhe mānābhāva ākāṅkṣāyā nivṛttervipratiṣedhaśāstrabādhe mānābhāvāccetyetasya bījam //
GS24paribhsu:860: madye 'pavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante, nottarān // Paribh_60 //
GS24paribhsu:861: tenauṣṭhādiṣu pañcasu“asaṃyogopadhāt“iti pratiṣedha eva bādhyate, na tu sahanañvidyamānalakṣaṇa iti
GS24paribhsu:862: “nāsikodara“itytra bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ pūrvopasthita bādhena nairākāṅkṣyamasyā bījam//
GS24paribhsu:863: nanu“vā chandasi“ityanena“serhyapicca“ityanantarasyāpitvasyeva herapi vikalapaḥ syāt/ tathā“noṭa“iti niṣedho 'nantarahalantalakṣaṇāyā iva sicivṛddhimṛjivṛddhayorapi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:866: anantarasya vidhirvā bhavati pratiṣedho veti // Paribh_61 //
GS24paribhsu:867_1: ktici“iti sūtre dīrghagrahaṇañca -- caritārtham / taddhyanantarasyānudāttopadeśetyasyaiva niṣedhābhāvāya /
GS24paribhsu:868: madhye 'pavādanyayāpekṣayānantarasyeti nyāyaḥ prabala iti“aṣṭābhyaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:869: pratyāsattimūlako 'yam/ lakṣyānurodhātta vyavasthetyapi pakṣāntaram/ tatra tatra kvacit svaritatvapratijñānāt,
GS24paribhsu:870_0: sāmarthyena vā bādhyate 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ / yathā“ṭiḍiḍhā“iti sūtreṇa ḍāpāvyavahitasyāpi
GS24paribhsu:870_1: ṅīpo vidhiḥ /“na ṣaṭ“ityādinā dvayorapi ṭābṅīpoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / iyañca“śi sarvanāmasthānam“ityādau
GS24paribhsu:872: sthānivatvābhāvādādeśo na syāditi tadvaiyarthyāpattiḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:875: lakṣaṇaikacakṣuṣako hyapavādaviṣayaṃ paryālocya tadviṣayatvābhāvaniṣcaya utsargeṇa tattallakṣyaṃ saṃskaroti/ anyathā vikalpāpattirityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:876: abhiniviśanta ityasya buddhyārūḍhā bhavantītyarthaḥ/ 'apavādo yadyanyatra caritārthaḥ' iti nyāyasya tu nātra praptiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:878: lakṣyaikacakṣuṣkastu tacchāstra paryālocanaṃ vināpyapavādaviṣayaṃ parityajyotsargeṇa lakṣyaṃ saṃskaroti,
GS24paribhsu:882: tata ityasyāpavādaśāstraparyālocanāt prāgapītyarthaḥ/ prakalpyetyasya parityajyetyarthaḥ/ ata eva prātipadikārtha sūtre bhāṣye“idaṃ dvayapyuktvā na kadācittāvadutsargo bhavati,
GS24paribhsu:887: yattvabhyastasaṃjñāsūtre kaiyaṭena prakalpya ceti pratīkamupādāya yathā 'na samprasāraṇa iti parasya yaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇam,
GS24paribhsu:889: tattu tata utsarga ityādyakṣarārthānanuguṇam/ yattvapavādavākyārthaṃ vinā notsargavākyārtha iti,
GS24paribhsu:894_2: ata eva“tau sat' ityādi saṅgacchate / ata eva nirdeśād bhraṣṭāvasaranyāyasyātra śāstreṇānāśrayaṇam /
GS24paribhsu:894_3: dhvanitaṃ cedam“ikoguṇa“iti sūtre bhāṣya iti bhāṣyapradīpodyote nirūpitam /
GS24paribhsu:895: atra 'devadattasya hantari hate devadattasyonmajjanaṃ na' iti nyāyasya viṣaya eva nāsti/ hate
GS24paribhsu:897: hanane tu bhavatyevonmajjanam/ prakṛte 'pi na pūrvasavarṇadīrgheṇa vṛddherhananam,
GS24paribhsu:898: kintu hananodyamasajātīyaṃ prasakti mātram, prasaktasyaiva niṣedhāt/
GS24paribhsu:899: pratipadoktatvamapi niravakāśatve satyeva bādhaprayojakam/ spaṣṭañcadam“śeṣādvibhāṣā“iti sūtre bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'śeṣagrahaṇamanarthakam,
GS24paribhsu:900: ye pratipadaṃ vidhīyante te bādhakā bhaviṣyanti' ityāśaṅkya,
GS24paribhsu:901: 'anavakāśā hi vidhayo bādhakā bhavanti samāsāntāśca kababhāve sāvakāśāḥ' ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:902: kvacidanavakāśatvābhāve 'pi paranityādisamavadhāne śīghropasthitikatvena pūrvapravṛttiprayajakaṃ balavatvaṃ pratipadavidhitvenāpi,
GS24paribhsu:903: paranityāntaraṅgapratipadavidhayo virodhisannipāte teṣāṃ mithaḥ parabalīyastvamiti“pratyayottarapadayośca“iti sūtre kaiyaṭena pāṭhāt/
GS24paribhsu:904: ata eva 'rame' ityādaupratipadoktatvāt pūrvametva ākārapraśleṣāddhalṅyādilopo na prāpnotītyāśaṅkya“eṅhrasvāt“iti lopena samāhitam//
GS24paribhsu:905: nanu 'ayaje indiram' ityādāvantaraṅgasyāpi guṇasyāpavādena savarṇa dīrghema bādhaḥ syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:908_1: savarṇadīrghaḥ samānāśraye caritārtho yaṇguṇayorapavādo 'pi bādhyate / pūrvopasthitinimittatvarūpāntaraṅgatvaviṣaya idam /
GS24paribhsu:912: kambalaḥ kauṇḍinyāya' ityādau kambaladānena na dadhidānabādha iti“chvoḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ/ tanna,
GS24paribhsu:914: nanu 'ajīgaṇat' ityādau gaṇerītvaṃ niravakāśatvāddhalādiḥśeṣaṃ bādheta, tatrāha :-
GS24paribhsu:917: “dīrgho 'kitaḥ“ityakidgrahaṇamasyā jñāpakam/ anyathā 'yaṃyayamyate' ityatra nuki kṛte 'najantatvād dīrghāprāptyā tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:919: ādye sanvadbhāvasya paratvaddīrgheṇa bādhaḥ prāpnoti/ antye“mānbadha“iti dīrgheṇāntaraṅgatvādityasya bādhaḥ prāptaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:920: yattu yatraikaikapravṛtyuttaramapi sarveṣāṃ pravṛttistatraivedamityataḥ“eka“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:923: nanu taccholāditṛnviṣaye ṇvulapi syāt/ na ca tṛnnapavādaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:927: ṇvuli siddhe“nindahiṃsa“ādisūtreṇaikājbhyo vuñvidhānamatra jñāpakam/ tatra ṇvulvuñoḥ svare viśeṣābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:928: tācchīlikeṣviti viṣayasaptamī/ tena tācchīlikairatācchīlikaiśca vāsarūpavidhirneti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:930: kamanā' ityādyasiddhiḥ“namikampi“iti reṇa“anudāttetaśca halādeḥ“iti yuco bādhāditi cet,
GS24paribhsu:932: nanvevam 'hasitaṃ chātrasya hasanam' ityādau ghañ, 'icchati bhoktum' ityatra liṅloṭau,
GS24paribhsu:933: 'īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavatā' ityatra khal prāpnotītyata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:936: idañca vāsarūpavidheranityatvāt siddham/ tadanityatve jñapakaṃ ca 'arhe kṛtyatṛcaśca' iti/
GS24paribhsu:937: tatra hi cakārasamuccitaliṅā kṛtyatṛcorbādho mā bhūditi kṛtyatṛjgrahaṇaṃ kriyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ/ “vāsarūpa“sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:938: nanu“śvaḥ paktā“ityatra vāsarūpavidhinā lṝḍapi prāpnoti, kṛte ādeśe vairūpyādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:941_0: ādeśakṛtavairūpyavatsu lakāreṣu sa nāstītyarthaḥ / atra ca“haśaśvatorlaṅca“iti laṅ
GS24paribhsu:941_1: vidhānaṃ jñāpakam / anyathā“parokṣe liṭ“iti liṭā laṅaḥ samāveśo 'sārūpyāt siddha
GS24paribhsu:942_1: vāgrahaṇaṃ ca kṛtam / tajjñapayati“vāsarūpa“sūtre 'pavāda ādeśatvānākrāntaḥ pratyaya
GS24paribhsu:942_2: eva gṛhyata iti kaiyaṭādau dhvanitam / tatphalaṃ tu sadādibhyo bhūtasāmānye liṭaḥ kvasureva,
GS24paribhsu:944: nanu“ṅamo hrasvāt“ityādau ṅamaḥ parasyāco 'ci parato ṅama iti veti sandehaḥ syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:947: acīti saptamīnirdeśasya“mayauño“ityuttaratra cāritārthyāt pañcamīnirdeśo 'navakāśa iti“tasmādityuttarasya“ityasyaiva pravṛttiḥ/ yatra tu“ḍaḥ si dhuṭ“ityādāvubhayorapyacāritārthyam,
GS24paribhsu:949_0: evamubhayoścāritārthye 'pi / yathā“āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ“ityādau / tatrā'mīti saptamī“trestrayaḥ“ityatra
GS24paribhsu:953: nanu“ataḥ kṛkami“iti satvam 'ayaskumbhī' ityatra na syāt kumbhaśabdasyaivopādānāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:956: sāmānyarūpeṇa viśeṣarūpeṇa vā prātipadikabodhakaśabdagrahaṇe sati liṅgabodhaka pratyaya viśiṣṭasyāpi tena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam/ apinā kevalasyāpītyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:957: asyāśca jñāpakaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇādhikārasthe“kumāra śramaṇādibhiḥ“iti sūtre strīliṅgaśramaṇādiśabdapāṭhaḥ/ strīpratyayaviśiṣṭaśramaṇādibhiśca kumārīśabdasyaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GS24paribhsu:964: samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca na pravartata iti ṅyāp sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:971: doṣāḥ khalvapi sākalyena parigaṇitāḥ' iti bhāṣyokteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:972: nanvevam“bahuvrīherūdhasoṅīṣ“iti sūtrastha bhāṣyāsaṅgatiḥ/ tatra hi 'kuṇḍodhnī' ityatra“nadyṛtaśca“iti kabāpādito nadyantabahuvrīherityarthāt,
GS24paribhsu:973: nadyantasya bahuvrīhitvābhāvāt tadasaṅgatiḥ/ nadyantānāṃ yaḥ samāsa ityarthena ca parihṛtam/
GS24paribhsu:976: anayā paribhāṣayā strīpratyaya samabhivyāhāre tadrahite dṛṣṭānāṃ prātipadikatva tadvyāpya dharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭe 'pi paryāptatvamatidiśyata ityāśayāt//
GS24paribhsu:977: nanvevam 'yūnaḥ paśya' ityatreva 'yuvatiḥ paśya' ityatrāpi“śvayuvonām“iti samprasāraṇaṃ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:981: spaṣṭā ceyam“yuvoranākau“ityatra bhāṣye/ ghaṭaghaṭīgrahaṇena liṅgaviśiṣṭaparibhāṣayā anityatvāt tanmūlaiṣetyanye//
GS24paribhsu:985: “arddhaṃ napuṃsakam“iti napuṃsakagrahaṇamsyā jñāpakam/ nityanapuṃsakatvārthaṃ tu na tadityanyatra nirūpitam/
GS24paribhsu:986: dhānyapalālanyāyena nāntarīyakatayā tayorupādānamiti“tasyāpatyam“ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ ata eva“ākaḍāra“sūtre eketi caritārthamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:987: nanu“bhaśādibhyo bhuvyacveḥ“ityādau vidhīyamānaḥ kyaṅ 'kva divā bhṛśā bhavanti' ityatrāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:990_0: nañyuktamiva yuktaṃ ca yat kiñcid dṛśyate tatra tasmād bhinne tatsadṛśe 'dhikaraṇe
GS24paribhsu:990_1: dravye kāryaṃ vijñāyate / hi yataḥ tathārthagatirasti / na hi 'abrahmaṇamānaya' ityukte
GS24paribhsu:991: “oṣadheśca vibhaktāvaprathamāyām“ityādau vibhaktigrahaṇametannyāyasididhārthānuvāda eva/ etena vibhaktāvityādyasyānityatve jñāpakamiti vadantaḥ parāstāḥ,
GS24paribhsu:992: anityatve bhāṣyasammata phalābhāvāt/ ata eva 'akartari ca' iti sūtre kāraka grahaṇaṃ bhāṣye pratyākhyātamiti bodhyam/ spaṣṭā ceyam“bhṛśādibhyaḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:993: atrānyasadṛśetyuktvā sādṛśyasya bhedāghaṭitatvaṃ sūcayati/ nirūpitaṃ caitanmañjūṣāyām//
GS24paribhsu:995: kaccapī' ityādau subantena samāsāt tato 'pyantaraṅgatvāṭṭāp adantatvābhāvājjāti lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:999_1: ityarthāt tayoḥ sūtrayoḥ supsupetyasya nivṛtyaikadeśānumatyā kārakāṃśe ca siddheyam /
GS24paribhsu:999_2: tena 'aśvakrītī' iti siddhā / anyathā pūrvaṃ ṭāpyadantatvābhāvāt“krītātkaraṇapūrvāt“iti ṅīṣ na syāt /
GS24paribhsu:1003_0: tatrājāditvāṭṭābityāhuḥ / ata eva 'kumbhakāraḥ' ityādau ṣaṣṭhī samāso 'pi subutpatteḥ
GS24paribhsu:1003_1: pūrvameva / ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāve copapadasamāsakṛta ekārthībhāva iti na tatra vākyamiti bhāṣye spaṣṭam /
GS24paribhsu:1004: tatra hi 'ṣaṣṭhīsamāsādupapadasamāso vipratiṣedhena' iti vārttikam/ athavā 'vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī samāso yadā na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadopapadasamāsaḥ' iti tatpratyākhyānaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:1007: 'athavā' ityādi bhāṣyaṃ paribhāṣāyāṃ sāmānyataḥ kārakopādānena kārakavibhaktyantena kṛdbhiḥ samāsamātrasya subutpatteḥ pūrvameva lābhāt/
GS24paribhsu:1008: etenaiṣā kārakatadviśeṣayorupādāna eveti parāstam/ asyā vidhyekavākyatvābhāvena vipratiṣedhādi
GS24paribhsu:1010: nanu“ugidacām“ityatra dhātoścedugitkāryaṃ tarhyañcatereveti niyamenādhātoreva numi siddhe 'dhātugrahaṇaṃ vyartham, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1013: tattad vacanasāmarthya nyāyasiddheyam/ tatsāmarthyādadhātubhūtapūrvasyāpītyarthena gomatyateḥ kvipi 'gomān' ityādau num siddhiḥ/“nāmi“ityādisūtreṣu bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1016: apinā atadguṇasaṃvijñānam/ teṣāṃ guṇānāmavayavapadārthānāṃ saṃvijñānaṃ viśeṣānvayitvamiti tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1019: 'sarvādīni, jakṣatyādayaḥ' iti codāharaṇe/ sarvanāmasaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1020: nanu“vadaḥ supi kyap ca“iti cenānukṛṣṭasya yataḥ“bhuvo bhāve“ityatrāpyanuvṛttiḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1023: ṇamulyanuvartamāne“avyaye 'yathābhipreta“iti sūtre punarṇamulgrahaṇanasyā jñāpakam/ anyathā 'ktvā ca' iti vadet/
GS24paribhsu:1025: idamanityam/ ata eva“tṛtīyā ca hoḥ“ityatra cānukṛṣṭāyā api dvitīyāyā“antarāntareṇa“ityatra sambandhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1026_1: vyākhyānādevānuvṛtti nivṛttyornirvāha iti tadāśayaḥ /“kulijāllukkhau ca“iti sūtrasthabhāṣyaviruddhā
GS24paribhsu:1026_2: ca / tatra hi“dvigoḥ ṣṭhaṃśca“iti sūtrāt ṣṭhanaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1027: tatra 'cenāpyanukṛṣṭasya kho 'nyatarasyām' ityasya cānuvṛttiṃ svīkṛtya lukkhau ceti bhāṣye pratyākhyātam//
GS24paribhsu:1028: nanvanudāttāderantodāttācca yaducyate tadvyañjanādervyañjanāntācca na prāpnotītyata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1032: dharmigrāhakamānādeva ca svaroddeśyakaviṣayamidam/ ata eva“śaturanumonadyajādī,“acaḥ kartturyaki“
GS24paribhsu:1033: ityādau aca ityādeścāritārthyam/ ata eva“rājavatī“ityādau nalopasyāsiddhatvādanvatīśabdatvāt,
GS24paribhsu:1035: 'udaśvitvān' ityatra“hrasvanuḍbhyām“iti matubudāttatvaṃ ca netyākaraḥ/ spaṣṭaṃ cedam“samāsasya“iti
GS24paribhsu:1038: samimavyāhṛtājuparāgeṇa halo 'pyudāttādivadavabhāsāttadupapatteḥ' ityāha/ tatra bhāṣye 'pi dhvanitametat//
GS24paribhsu:1039: nanvevamapi 'rājadṛṣat' itiyādau“samāsasya“ityantodāttatvaṃ ṣakārākārasya na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1042: asyāśca“yatonāvaḥ“iti sūtre 'naupratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ/ 'nāvyam' ityatrādirnakāro na svarayogyaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1046: ityanyatra vistaraḥ/ spaṣṭā ceyam“samāsasya“iti sūtre bhāṣye//
GS24paribhsu:1047: nanu“pūraṇa guṇa“iti niṣedhastavyatyapi syāt“diva aut“itiyautvaṃ diveḥ kvipyapi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1048: tathā“yato 'nāvaḥ“iti svaro ṇyatyapi syāt“ṛdṛśo 'ṅi guṇaḥ“iti caṅyapi syāt; ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1053: ityatra tayoragrahaṇārtham/ nañaḥ parasya yayadantasyottarapadasyānta udātta iti tadarthaḥ/ evaṃ cāvāmadevye 'vyaya
GS24paribhsu:1055: tanmātrānubandhakagrahaṇe sa cānyaścānubandho yasya tadgrahaṇaṃ netyantyārthaḥ/ ete ca pratyayāpratyayasādhāraṇe,
GS24paribhsu:1057: varṇagpahaṇe cānayorapravṛttiriti spaṣṭam“auṅa āpaḥ“ityatra bhāṣye/ yenānubandhena sānubandhakatvaṃ dvyanubandhakatvādi vā tadanuccāraṇe evaiṣā,
GS24paribhsu:1058: dharmigrāhakamānāt/ tena“jaśśasoḥ“ityatra naiṣeti niranubandhakatvāt taddhitaśata evātra grahaṇaṃ syāditi na śaṅkyam/
GS24paribhsu:1060: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe sambhavatīti tvartho na bhāṣyādisammata ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1061: nanu 'kuṭīraḥ' ityādau svārthikatvāt svārthikānāṃ prakṛtito liṅgavatanānuvṛtternyāyaprāptatvāt puṃstvānupapattiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1065: “ṇacaḥ striyām“iti sūtre striyāmityuktirasyā jñāpikā/ anyathā“karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām“iti striyāmeva vidhānāt kiṃ tena?
GS24paribhsu:1067: nanu 'supathī nagarī' iti“yuvoranākau“iti sūtrabhāṣyodāhṛte“inaḥ striyām“iti kap syāt ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1070: “prateraṃśvādayastatpuruṣe“ityantodāttatvāyāṃśvādiṣu rājame śabdapāṭho 'syā jñāpakaḥ/ anyathā ṭacaṃvāntodāttatve siddhe kiṃ tena?
GS24paribhsu:1072: nanu 'śatāni' ityādau numi kṛte ṣaṭsaṃjñā prāpnoti, tataśca luk syāt, tathā 'upādāsta'
GS24paribhsu:1076: sannipātaḥudvayoḥ sambandhaḥ, tannimitto vidhistaṃ sannipātaṃ yo vihanti, tasyānimittam/
GS24paribhsu:1078: ata evātra sannipātaśabdena na pūrvaparayoḥ sambandha eva,
GS24paribhsu:1079_0: kintu viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇa sannipāto 'pi gṛhyate / ata eva 'grāmaṇi kulam' ityādau napuṃsakahrasvatve
GS24paribhsu:1079_1: 'pi“piti kṛti“iti tuk na / prātipadikājantatvasannipātena jātasya hrasvasya tadavidhāyakatvāt /
GS24paribhsu:1081: arthakṛtabahiraṅgatvānāśrayaṇasyoktatvāt/ kiñca“ṣatvatukorasiddhaḥ“ityetadbalāt kṛtituggrahaṇācca tugvidhau bahiraṅgaparibhāṣāyā apravṛtteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1084: -- 'na hi pratyayaḥ pūrva para sannipāta nimittakaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1085: sa eva ca sannipāta śabdena gṛhyata iti matvā na pratyayaḥ sannipātanimittakaḥ iti śaṅkāyāṃ tadabhyupetyaivāṅgasaṃjñā tarhyanimittaṃ syādityekadeśinoktam' iti na tadbhāṣyavirodhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1088: vainateyaḥ' ityādāvapyaṅgasaṃjñāyā lopanimittatvānāpatyā varṇāśraya ityasya vaiyarthayam/
GS24paribhsu:1092: sannipātalakṣaṇavidhitvamasyā liṅgam/ svapravṛtteḥ prāk svanimittabhūto yaḥ sannipātaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1096: na ca yañāditvasāpekṣadīrghasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvānnātra sannipātavighāta iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1098: kiñcāntaraṅge kartavye bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatve 'pi tatra kṛte tasyāsiddhatve mānābhāḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1109: na ca 'kumbhakārebhyaḥ, ādhaye' ityādāvavyayasaṃjñāyā anayā paribhāṣayā vāraṇaparabhāṣyāsaṅga
GS24paribhsu:1111: avyayatvaṃ tu syādeva/ lukā hi tadīyasannipātasya vighātaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1113: etadudāharaṇaparabhāṣyaprāmāṇyena sākṣātparamparayā vā svanimittasannipātavighātakasya svayamanimityamityarthenādoṣāt/ etenātrākac syādityapāstam/
GS24paribhsu:1118: “nayāsayoḥ“iti nirdeśāścaiṣānityā/ tena nātiprasaṅgaḥ/ spaṣṭā ceyaṃ“kṛnmejantaḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye/ asyā anityatve phalāni bhāṣye parigaṇitāni - varṇāśrayaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1120_0: 'dākṣiḥ' / ātvaṃ pugvidheḥ - krāpayati / pughrasvasya - adītapat / tyadādyakāraṣṭābvidheḥ
GS24paribhsu:1125: nanu 'pañcendrāṇyo devatā asya pañcendraḥ' ityādau“dvigorluk“ityaṇo luki“lukstaddhita” iti strīpratyayalukyānukaḥ śravaṇāpattiḥ, ata āha -
GS24paribhsu:1128_0: atra ca“bilvakādibhyaśchasya luk“iti sūtrasthaṃ chagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam / taddhi chamātrasya
GS24paribhsu:1128_1: lugbodhana dvārā kuko 'nivṛttiryathā syādityartham / kṛta kugāgamānaḍādyantargatā
GS24paribhsu:1131: anyathā“bilvādibhyaḥ“ityeva vadet/ lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣayā bilvādipuraskāreṇa vihitapratyayasyaiva lugvidhānānnātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1134: ṭilopenaiva ṅīpi nivṛtte 'sanniyogaśiṣṭa' paribhāṣayā tasyāpi nivṛtyā 'etayati' ityādisiddhau puṃvatvavaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameveti“ṭeḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1137: 'iḍabiḍamācaṣṭa aiḍabiḍayati' ityādau puṃvatvasyāvaśyakatvāt/ 'aineyaḥ śyaineyaḥ' ityādi tu sthānivatvena siddhamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1138: nanu 'curā śīlamasyāḥ sā caurī'ityādau śīlam“chatrādibhyo ṇaḥ“iti ṇe ṅīp na prāpnotītyata
GS24paribhsu:1143: tācchīlikaṇāntāt“aṇodvyacaḥ“iti phiñsiddhirapyasyāḥ prayojanamiti navyāḥ/ tācchīlika ityukteḥ“tadasyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:1144: praharaṇam“iti ṇe 'dāṇḍā' ityeva/“kārmaḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1149: 'dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam' iti pāṭhastu 'prasṛḍbhiḥ' ityādau“anudāttasya cardupadhasya“ityāmāpādanena bhāṣye dūṣitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1150: yatkāryaṃ pratyayanimittaṃ tatreyaṃ vyavasthāpikā/ tena padāntatvanibandhanam“naśervā“iti kutvam 'praṇagbhyām' ityādau bhavatyeva/ iyaṅādividhau tu naiṣā,
GS24paribhsu:1152: nanu 'sarvake, iccakaiḥ' ityādau sarvanāvyayasaṃjñe na syātām, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1155: “nedamadasorakoḥ“iti sūtre 'akoḥ' iti niṣedho 'syā jñāpakaḥ/ 'tadekadeśabhūtaṃ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate' iti“yena vidhiḥ“iti sūtre bhāṣye pāṭhaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1156: nanu“gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ“iti sico luk 'apāsīta' ityādau pāterapi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1159: asyāñca jñāpakaḥ“svarati sūti“iti sūtre sūṅiti vaktavye sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti
GS24paribhsu:1162: dhvanitā ceyaṃ paribhāṣā“yasya vibhāṣā“ityatra bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'viditaḥ' iti prayoge niṣedhamāśaṅkya 'yadupādervibhāṣā,
GS24paribhsu:1163: tadupāderniṣedhaḥ“vibhāṣā gamahanavidaviśām“iti sūtre 'śavikaraṇasya gpahaṇaṃ lugvikaraṇaścāyam' ityuktam/ tatra co hetau,
GS24paribhsu:1168_0: ata eva paribhāṣāyāṃ lugvikaraṇasyaiveti noktam / kaṇṭhatastu bhāṣye eṣā kvāpi na
GS24paribhsu:1168_1: paṭhitā / 'gātisthā' iti sūtre 'pibatergrahaṇam kartavyam' iti vārtikakṛtā 'sarvatraiva
GS24paribhsu:1168_2: pāgrahaṇe 'lugvikaraṇasya gpahaṇam' iti bhāṣyakṛtā coktam / “svarati sūti“iti sūtre
GS24paribhsu:1169: nanu 'prajighāyayiṣati' ityādau“heracaṅi“iti vidhīyamānaṃ kutvaṃ na syāt ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1172: acaṅīti pratiṣedha evāsyā jñāpakaḥ/ iyaṃ ca kutva viṣayaiva/“heracaṅi“iti sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1174: nanu 'yuṣmabhyam' ityādau 'bhyasaḥ' ityatra bhyamiti cchede bhyaso bhyami kṛte 'ntyalope etvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1178: tasmin sati punaranyasyāṅgakāryasya vṛttau pravṛttāvavidhānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1179_1: ca siddhe tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva / ata eva“jñājanorjā” “jyādādīyasaḥ“iti sūtrayorenāṃ
GS24paribhsu:1179_2: jñāpayitvā kiṃ prayojanamiti praśne pibaterguṇapratiṣedha uktaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1182: na tu lakṣyasiddhirūpam/ taduktam“bhyaso bhyam“ityatra 'abhyam' iti cchedaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1183: “śeṣe lopaḥ“cāntyalopa eva“ato guṇe“iti pararūpeṇa siddham 'yuṣmabhyam' ityanyatra nirūpitam/
GS24paribhsu:1184: evañca sūtradvayasthametajjñāpanaparaṃ bhāṣyam“bhyaso bhyam“iti sūtrasthaṃ ca bhāṣyamekadeśyuktirityāhuḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1188: idañca vidheyakoṭau saṃjñāpūrvakatva eva/ 'tena svāyambhuvam' ityādi siddham//
GS24paribhsu:1193: tathā tanādipāṭhādeva siddhe“tanādikṛñbhyaḥ“iti sūtre kṛñ grahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1201: tathā vinārtha nañā samāsena“anudāttam padamanekam“ityeva siddhe varjagrahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1210: āḍgrahaṇaṃ tu loḍgrahaṇavaditi bodhyam/ ata eva“ghorlopo liṭi vā“it sūtre veti pratyākhyātam/ lope 'pyāṭpakṣe āṭaḥ śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati -- 'dadhāt' iti,
GS24paribhsu:1211: aṭi 'dadhat' iti/ āgamaśāstrasyānityatve tvāṭyasati 'dadhāt' ityasiddhyā vāgrahaṇasyāvaśyakatvena tatpratyākhyānāsaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1215: tanādi sūtre kṛñgrahaṇasya bhāṣye pratyākhyānācca/ cakṣiṅo ṅakārasyānteditvābhāvasampādanena cāritārthyācca//
GS24paribhsu:1220: ityādi bhāṣyānuktaṃ bodhyam/ 'svāyamabhuvam' ityādi loke 'sādhveva, ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1221: yadapi -- nanu hanterayaṅlukyāśīrliṅi vadhādeśo na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1224: ṣāṣṭadvitvasya dviḥprayogasiddhāntena prayogadvayarūpe samudāye prakṛtirūpatvabodhanenedaṃ nyāyasiddham/
GS24paribhsu:1225: ata eva juhudhītyadau dvitve kṛte dhitvasiddhiriti/ tadapi na,
GS24paribhsu:1226: bhāṣye 'darśanāt/ kiñca tena siddhantena pratyekaṃ dvayostatvabodhane 'pi samudāyasya tatvabodhane mānābhāvaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1227: ata eva“dayaderdigi“iti sūtre 'steḥ paratvād dvitve kṛte parasyāsterbhūbhāve pūrvasya śravaṇaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkya viṣayasapmyāśrayaṇena parihṛtaṃ bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1228: anyathā tvaduktarītyā 'ekājdvirvacana' nyāyena samudāyasyaivādeśāpattau tadasaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1230_1: iti na tadvirodhaḥ / tasmāddhanteryaṅluki 'vadhyāt' ityādi mādhavādyudāhṛtaṃ cintyamevetyanyatra vistaraḥ //
GS24paribhsu:1234: anūdyamāna viśeṣaṇeṣu tanniyāmikā paribhāṣā nopatiṣṭata ati tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1237: kiñca“udīcāmātaḥ sthāne“iti sūtre sthāne grahaṇamasyā liṅgam/ anyathā“ṣaṣṭī sthāne“
GS24paribhsu:1243: paribhāṣālabhya ityarthasya“ṣaṣṭī sthāne“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭamuktatvena tvaduktajñapakāvambhavācca/ tatra sthānegrahaṇaṃ tu spaṣṭārthameva/
GS24paribhsu:1246: nanu 'namaskaroti devān' 'namasyati devān' ityādau“namaḥ svasti“it caturthī durvārā, ityata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1249: kārakavibhaktitvañca kriyājanakārthakavibhaktitvam/ tacca prathamāyā apyastīti sāpi kārakavibhaktiriti“sahayukte“ityādisūtreṣu bhāṣye dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:1250: iyaṃ ca vācanikyeva/ ata eva“yasyaca bhāvena“iti saptamyapekṣayādhikaraṇasaptamyā balavatvamanena nyāyena,
GS24paribhsu:1252: kaiyaṭena ca spaṣṭamuktam/ etena 'kriyānvayitvaṃ kārakatvam' ityapāstam,
GS24paribhsu:1255: teṣāmubhayorapi kriyāsambandhanimittakatvena tadasaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/“namo variva“itisūtre 'namasyati devān' ityādau caturthī vāraṇāya bhāṣye upanyāsasyāsaṅgateśca//
GS24paribhsu:1257: upapadārthena tu yatkiñcit ktiyākārakamūlakaḥ sambandha iti tannimittā vibhaktirbahiraṅgetyapāstam,
GS24paribhsu:1258: 'namasyati' ityatra namaḥ padārthe 'pi kriyākārakābhāve naivānvayāt/ atra ca namaḥ padārthasyāpi kriyātvaṃ muṇḍayatau muṇḍasyeva/
GS24paribhsu:1259: “sahayukte“ityādau ca pradhāne prathamā sādhanārthamiyaṃ bhāṣya upanyastetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1260: nanu 'adamuyaṅ' ityādau pūrvasyāpi muktvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1263: anantyasadeśānanyasadeśayorekaprayoge yugapatprāptavantyasadeśasyaveti tadarthaḥ/ anyathā dhātvādernatvasatve'netā' 'sotā' ityādāveva syātām,
GS24paribhsu:1266: antyena samāno deśo yasya so 'ntyasadeśaḥ/ tatvaṃ cāntyavarṇatadvarṇayoritarāvyavadhānena bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1267: ata eva vidhdha ityādyartham“na samprasāraṇe“iti caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1270: na caiṣā“ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam“iti sūtre bhāṣye pratyākhyāteti bhramitavyam,
GS24paribhsu:1273_1: tatra vṛddheḥ pūrvamantaraṅgatvāt dvitve paratvādabhyāsakārye tato 'bhyāsekārasya
GS24paribhsu:1275: yattu“na samprasāraṇe“iti sūtre bhāṣye 'naitasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni' ityuktam/ tasyāyamarthaḥ --
GS24paribhsu:1278: etasyāḥ prayojanāni' iti pāṭho 'pi kvacid dṛśyate/
GS24paribhsu:1279: vācanikyevaiṣā/ spaṣṭā ca“ṣyaṅaḥ“iti sūtre“adaso 'seḥ“iti sūtre ca 'kecidantyasadeśasya' ityanena bhāṣya ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1287: eṣā“alontyāt“sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā/ phalānāmanyathāsiddhikaraṇepratyākhyātā ceti tata evāvadhāryatām//
GS24paribhsu:1294: nanu svasrāditvaprayukto mātṛ śabdasya ṅībniṣedhaḥ paricchettṛvācakamātṛśabde 'pi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1299: na paricchattṛvācakasya/ 'yogajabodhe tadanāliṅgitaśuddharūḍhajopasthitiḥ pratibandhikā' iti vyutpattireva tadbījam/ rathakārādhikaraṇanyāyasiddho 'yamarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1300: kaścittu“dīdhīvevīṭām“ityatrānayā paribhāṣayā dīdhīvevīṅoreva grahaṇam, na dīṅdhīṅveñ
GS24paribhsu:1301: vīnāmiti, tat, na; tathā sati 'dīvedhīvīṭām' ityeva vadediteyanye//
GS24paribhsu:1302: nanu vātāyanārthe gavākṣe 'vaṅo vaikalpikatvāt 'gokṣaḥ' ityādyapi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1305: lakṣyānusārād vyavasthā bodhyā/“śācchoḥ“iti sūtre“laṭaḥ śatṛ“ityādi sūtreṣu ca bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1308: niyame hyaśrutāyā anyanivṛtteḥ sāmarthyāt parikalpanamuktānuvādadoṣaśceti lāghavād vidhireveti bodhyam/“yasya halaḥ“ityatra“ijādeḥ sanumaḥ“ityādau ca bhāṣye spaṣṭeyam//
GS24paribhsu:1309: nanu“āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavacca“ityanena luṅa iva laṅliṭorapyatideśaḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1312: sāmānyopasthitikāle niyamena viśeṣopasthāpakasāmagryabhāvo 'syā bījam/ tenānadyatanabhūtarūpe viśeṣe vihitayostayornātideśaḥ/ iyamanityā,
GS24paribhsu:1313: “na lyapi“iti liṅgāt/ tena sthānivatsūtreṇa viśeṣātideśo 'pi/ spaṣṭaṃ caitatsarvaṃ“sthānivat“sūtre bhāṣye//
GS24paribhsu:1314: nanu“titsvaritam“iti svaritatvam 'cikīrṣati' ityādau syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1317: iyaṃ ca“aṅgasya“iti sūtr bhāṣye paṭhitā/ varṇagrahaṇe ca na pravartata iti tatraiva
GS24paribhsu:1318: kaiyaṭe spaṣṭam/ ata eva“sanāṃśabhikṣa uḥ““vale“ityatra sanvalayoḥ pratyayayorgrahaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:1319_0: pare tu“titsvaritam“iti sūtra eṣā paribhāṣā lakṣyasaṃskārāya bhāṣye kvāpi nāśriteti
GS24paribhsu:1319_1: kaiyaṭenoktam /“aṅgasya“iti sūtre tatpratyākhyānāyaiṣā bhāṣya ekadeśinoktā / ata
GS24paribhsu:1321: nanu“viparābhyāṃ jeḥ“ityātmanepadaṃ 'parāsenā jayati' ityarthake 'parājayati senā' ityatra
GS24paribhsu:1325_0: tena viśabdasāhacaryādupasargasyaiva parāśabdasya grahaṇamiti tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭam /
GS24paribhsu:1326: tayoreva sahaprayoga ityutsargācca/ dhvanitaṃ cedam“karmapravacanīyayukterdvitīyā“iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1327: tatra hi“pañcamyapāṅparibhiḥ“iti sūtreṇa lakṣaṇādidyotakapariyoge pañcamīmāśaṅkya 'yadyapyayaṃ parirdṛṣṭāpacāro varjane cāvarjane ca,
GS24paribhsu:1332: na gardabhaḥ' ityuktam/ tena hi sadṛśānāmeva prayoge sahāyabhāvo bādhitaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1333: “dvistriścatuḥ“iti sūtre sāhacaryeṇaiva kṛtvor'thasya grahaṇe siddhe kṛtvorthagrahaṇādeṣānityā/ tena“dīdhīvevīṭām“ityatra dhātusāhacarye 'pyāgamasyeṭo grahaṇamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1341: nāṅgasya śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu tu gṛhyamāṇasyābhāvāt prakaraṇaprāptaṅgasyaiva viśeṣaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:1342: ata eva“vā napuṃsakasya“iti sūtre“vā śau“iti na kṛtam/ tatra napuṃsakagrahaṇaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇasya śatrantasyaiva napuṃsakatve yathā syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1343: 'bahavo dadato yeṣu tāni kulāni bahudadati' ityatra mā bhūt;
GS24paribhsu:1344: 'bahūni dadanti yeṣu te bahudadantaḥ' ityatra yathā syādityevamartham/ spaṣṭaṃ cedam“svamornapuṃsakāt“ityatra bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1345: kecittu“aco rahābhyaṃ dve“ityatra śrutena rephasya nimittatvena yarantarbhāvādanumitena kāryitvaṃ bādhyata ityetadudāharaṇamāhuḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1351: tathā“gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ“iti luk 'pai ovai śeṣaṇe' ityataḥ kṛtātvāt parasyāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1356: śīgropasthitikatvāt/ dvitīyo hi vilambopasthitikaḥ/ 'pai' ityasya 'pā' iti rūpaṃ lakṣaṇānusandhānapūrvakaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1357: vilambopasthitikam/ pibatestu tacchīghropasthitikam/ idameva hyetat paribhāṣābījam/ iyaṃ varṇagrahaṇe 'pi“ot“sūtre bhāṣye sañcāritatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1359: tattu tasminneva sūtre śabdenduśekhare dūṣitamiti tata eva draṣṭavyam/
GS24paribhsu:1361: nanvevaṃ deṅo dodhātośca kṛtātvasya ghusaṃjñā na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1362: tathā meṅa ātve 'praṇimātā' ityādau“nergadanada“iti ṇatvaṃ na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1363: tathā 'gai' ityasyātve“ghumāsthā“itītvaṃ na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1366: atra ca jñāpakaṃ daipaḥ pitvam/ taddhi 'adāp' iti sāmānyagrahaṇārtham/ anyathā lākṣaṇikatvādeva vidhau tadgrahaṇe siddhe kiṃ niṣedhe sāmānyagrahaṇārthena pitvena?
GS24paribhsu:1367_0: tena caikadeśānumatidvārā sampūrṇā paribhāṣā jñāpyate / iyaṃ ca lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣāniranubandhakaparibhāṣālugvikaraṇaparibhāṣāṇāṃ
GS24paribhsu:1368: “gātisthā“iti sūtre iṇādeśagāgrahaṇameveṣyata iti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1372: nanvevaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñāsamāsasaṃjñābhyastasaṃjñā api pratyekaṃ syuḥ, ā āha --
GS24paribhsu:1376: arthinaśca rājāno hiraṇyāna bhavanti' ityādau daṇḍanavat/ lakṣyānurodhena ca vyavasthā//
GS24paribhsu:1377: nanu“yūstriyākhyau“ityatra vyaktipakṣe dīrghanirdeśādanaṇtvena grāhakasūtrāprāptyodāttādyanyatamoccāraṇe 'nyasvarakasya saṃjñā na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1380: asati yatne svarūpeṇoccārito guṇo na bhedakaḥ, na vivakṣita ityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1381: jātipakṣe tu nāsyopayoga iti bodhyam/ 'yū' ityādau dīrghamātravṛttijātinirdeśānna kṣatirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1382: nanu 'sarvanāmāni' ityatra ṇatvābhāvanipātane 'pi loke saṇatvaprayogasya sādhutvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1385: tattatkārye nāprāpte nipātanārambhāt/“purāṇaprokteṣu“iti nipātitapurāṇaśabdena purātana śabdasya bādhaḥ prāpto 'pi pṛṣodarāditvānneti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:1386: purāṇeti pṛṣotarādiḥ purātaneti cetyanye/ iyam“sarvādi“sūtra bhāṣye spaṣṭā/
GS24paribhsu:1387: na caivamasthayādīnāṃ“nabviṣayasya“ityādyudāttatayāntyādeśasyānaṅaḥ sthānyanurūpe 'nudātta evoccāraṇīya udāttoccāraṇaṃ vivakṣārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kathamasya jñāpatvamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1392: sahasya sa udātto nipātyate“ityādi bhāṣyaṃ tvekaśrutyāṣṭādhyāyīpāṭhe kvacidudāttādyu
GS24paribhsu:1394: “traisvaryeṇa pāṭhaḥ“iti pakṣe tu jñāpakaparaṃ bhāṣyāmiti kaiyaṭādayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1397: tattadrūpād yatnāt tatra tatrodāttādivivakṣā/“tisṛcatasṛ“ityatra dvandvaprayukte 'ntodātte uccāraṇīye ādyudāttoccāraṇam - anyatra
GS24paribhsu:1399: atra vikārakṛto lakṣyabhedo neti“sici vṛddhiḥ“iti bhāṣyāt pratīyate/
GS24paribhsu:1400: atra ca“asthidadhi“ityādāvanaṅāderudāttasyaivoccāraṇena siddhe udāttagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/ svarūpeṇoccārita ityukteranudāttāderantodāttādityudāttādiśabdoccāraṇe vivakṣaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1401_1: sthānyanurūpatayānunāsika evoccāraṇīye niranunāsikoccāraṇāt tadvivakṣā / etadarthamevāsati yatna ityuktam /
GS24paribhsu:1403: nanūkhadhātordvitve svata eva hrasvatvāt pūrvamabhyāsahrasvāprāptau halādiḥ śeṣe savarṇa dīrghe hrasvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1406: evaṃ ca hrasvasyāpi hrasve kṛte 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya' iti nyāyena na punarhrasvaḥ/ taduktam
GS24paribhsu:1407: “iko jhal“iti sūtre bhāṣye -- 'kṛtakāri khalvapi śāstraṃ parjanyavat' iti/ siddhe 'pi hrasvādhikārītyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1408: na ca 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya sakṛdeva pravṛttiḥ' ityatra na mānamiti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1409: “samovālopameke“iti lopenaikasakārasya dvitvena dvisakārasya punardvitvena ca trisakārasya siddhau“samaḥ suṭi“iti sūtrasyaiva mānatvāt,
GS24paribhsu:1411: sampūrṇāṣṭādhyāyyācāryeṇaikaśrutyā paṭhitetyatra na mānam/ kvacitpadasyaikaśrutyāpi pāṭhaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1412: yathā dāṇḍināyanādisūtre aikṣvāketi/ yadyapyadhyetāra ekaśrutyaivāṅgāni paṭhanti brahmaṇavat,
GS24paribhsu:1414: vidheyāṇ viṣaye tu“apratyayaḥ“iti niṣedhānna guṇābhedakatvena savarṇagrahaṇam,
GS24paribhsu:1415: ata eva 'ghaṭavat' ityādau matormasya nānunāsiko vakāraḥ/ ata eva“tadvānāsām“iti sūtranirdeśaḥ/ anyathā“pratyaye bhāṣāyām“iti nityamanunāsikaḥ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1421: 'caturbhyaḥ' iti tu spaṣṭārthameva/ ata eva tatpratyakhyānaṃ bhāṣyoktaṃ saṅgacchate/
GS24paribhsu:1422_0: ata eva savarṇasaṃjñāderniṣedhaviṣaye na vikalpaḥ / anyathā mīmāṃsakarītyā vidherupajīvyatvena
GS24paribhsu:1422_1: prabalyāt tasya sarvathā bādhānupapatyā durvāraḥ sa iti mañjūṣāyāṃ vistaraḥ / ata
GS24paribhsu:1427: yasyārthaḥ prakṛtyā pratyāyyate, so 'pi pratyaya ityasyāpyaṅgīkārāt tasya pratyayatvamiti na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1428: svārtha ityasya svīyaprakṛtyartha ityarthaḥ/ mahāsaṃjñābalādarthākāṅkṣāyāmanyānupasthitirasyā bījam/“supi sthaḥ“ityādi sūtreṣu bhāṣye spaṣṭaiṣā//
GS24paribhsu:1438: spaṣṭameva paṭhitavye 'numānād bodhanamasārvatrikatvārthamityarthaḥ/ tena jñāpakasiddhaparibhāṣāyāniṣṭaṃ nāpādanīyamiti tātparyam/ bhāṣye 'pi dhvanitametat“ṅyāp“sūtrādau/
GS24paribhsu:1439_1: bhāvaḥ / yathā 'tatsthānāpanne taddharnalābhaḥ' iti nyāyasiddhaṃ sthānivatsūtram,
GS24paribhsu:1442: droḍhā droḍhā' ityādau ghatvādīnāmasiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ dvitve ekatra ghatvam,
GS24paribhsu:1448: tatraiveyam/ 'kṛṣṇarddhiḥ' ityādau jaśtvātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā dvitve rūpe viśeṣābhāvena nāsyāḥ pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ/“sarvasya dve“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭeyam//
GS24paribhsu:1449: nanu 'goṣvaśveṣu ca svāmī' ityādivat 'goṣvaśvānāṃ ca svāmī' ityapi syāt“svāmīśvara“iti sūtreṇa ṣaṣṭhīsapmyorvidhānāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1451: ekasyā ākṛteścaritaḥ prayoge dvitīyasyāstṛtīyasyāśca na bhaviṣyati // Paribh_126 //
GS24paribhsu:1452: yatrānyākṛtikaraṇe bhinnārthatvasambhāvanā tadviṣayo 'yaṃ nyāya ityantra vistaraḥ/“kṛñcānuprayujyate“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭeyam//
GS24paribhsu:1453: nanu 'vivyādha' ityādau paratvāddhalādiḥśeṣe vasya samprasāraṇaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1455: samprasāraṇaṃ tadāśrayaṃ ca kāryaṃ balavat // Paribh_127 //
GS24paribhsu:1456: tadāśrayam“samprasāraṇācca“iti pūrvarūpam/ vastutaḥ“liṭyabhyāsasya“iti sūtre 'ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇasyobhayeṣāṃ samprasāraṇameva yathā syādityarthakatvenedaṃ siddhamityeṣā vyarthā,
GS24paribhsu:1457_0: “liṭyabhyāsasya“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam / phalāntarānyathāsiddhirapi tatraiva bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1457_1: spaṣṭā /“ṇau ca saṃścaṅoḥ“ityādau saṃścaṅoḥ ityādi viṣayasaptamīti tatrāpi na doṣa
GS24paribhsu:1469: 'na ca vikṛtiḥ prakṛtiṃ gṛhṇāti' iti“grahijyā“iti sūtrasthabhāṣyeṇādyāyāstiraskārācca/
GS24paribhsu:1472: prayogasthānāmevānukaraṇasya ghusaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭamuktatvādityanye/ antyāpi tatra tatropadeśagrahaṇaṃ kurvataḥ sūtrakṛtovārtikakṛtaścāsammatā/
GS24paribhsu:1473: 'iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣveva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu rūpamāśrīyate -- yatrāsyaitadrūpamiti,
GS24paribhsu:1475: tasmiṃśca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānāṃ prayogo nāstīti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayoga upāsyate,
GS24paribhsu:1476: 'ka upadeśo nāma' iti ghusaṃjñāsūtrastha bhāṣyeṇa prāyogikāsambhave tadgrahaṇamityarthasya lābhena bhāṣyāsammatā ca /
GS24paribhsu:1477: bhāṣye sānubandhaketyādi prakṛtābhiprayeṇa/“dādeḥ“iti sūtre dādipadasyaupadeśikadāditvavati lakṣaṇeti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1478: yadapi nanu 'ajarghā bebhidīti' ityādau tattadiguṇaprayuktā vikaraṇā yaṅluki syuḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1479: tathā yaṅluki 'bebhiditā' ityādau“ekācaḥ“itoṇ niṣedhaḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1481: śtipā śapānubandhena nirdiṣṭaṃ yad gaṇena ca /
GS24paribhsu:1482: yatraikājgrahaṇaṃ caiva pañcaitāni na yaṅluki // Paribh_130 //
GS24paribhsu:1490_1: ityādau bhavati / ata eva“śvoditaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭe -- 'yatraikāj grahaṇaṃ kiñcit'
GS24paribhsu:1490_2: iti pāṭhaḥ /“ekāca upadeśe /ṭanudāttāt“iti sūtra ekājgrahaṇenaikadeśānumatyaiṣā jñāpyate /
GS24paribhsu:1495_0: kiñca uttarārthamekājgrahaṇam / ata eva 'jāgaritavān' ityādāvupadeśa ugantatvamādāya“śruyukaḥ
GS24paribhsu:1495_1: kiti“itīṇ niṣedho na / tatropadeśe ityanuvṛttiśya 'stīrṇam' ityādāviṇ niṣedhāyetyākare spaṣṭam /
GS24paribhsu:1496: na ca bhāṣye yaṅ lopo 'bebhiditā' ityādāviṭpravṛtyarthamupadeśe 'nudāttādekācaḥ śrūyamāṇādaṅgādityarthe sanīṭpratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1500: tasya tadviṣayakatve yaṅlope sthānivatvasyevayaṅlukyupāyāpradarśanena nyūnatpattiriti vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1501_0: iḍviṣaye yaṅluko loke 'nabhidhānena chandasi sarvavidhīnāṃ vaikalpikatvena ca tatra
GS24paribhsu:1501_2: jāgartyarthamiha vadhyartham' ityuttarasya ca bhāṣye nirālambhanatvapatteḥ /
GS24paribhsu:1502: na cārdhadhātukākṣiptadhātorekāca iti viśeṣaṇam/ evaṃ ca 'bibhitsati' ityādāvuttarakhaṇḍasya dhātorekāctvamastyeva,
GS24paribhsu:1503: uttarakhaṇḍe 'stitvavat/ etacca 'dayateḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ evaṃ ca prakṛtabhāṣyāsaṅgatiriti vācyam ;
GS24paribhsu:1505_0: aṅgatvaṃ tu viśiṣṭa eveti“ekāco dve“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam / nirūpitaṃ ca tanādiśeṣe
GS24paribhsu:1505_1: śabdenduśekhare / dhātutvaṃ tūttarakhaṇḍa eva / ata eva“ekāco baśo bhaṣ“iti sūtre
GS24paribhsu:1505_2: dhātoravayavasyaikāca iti vaiyadhikaraṇyenānvaye gardhapsiddhiḥ prayojanamuktaṃ bhāṣye,
GS24paribhsu:1507: 'ajarghāḥ, bebhidīti' ityādau śnam śyanādayastu“carkarītaṃ ca“ityasyādādau pāṭhena
GS24paribhsu:1510: bhāṣāyāṃ tu tādṛśānāmabhāva eva/ śtipśabādinirdeśāstu 'bhavateraḥ' ityādi sūtrasthatannirdeśavannārthasādhakā ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1511: nanu 'jabho 'ci, radheśca, neṭyaliṭi' ityeva sūtryatām, kiṃ dvīradhigrahaṇenetyāha --
GS24paribhsu:1514_0: prativākyaṃ bhinnavākyārthabodhakalpanena gauravaṃ spaṣṭameva / parantu bhāṣyāsammateyam /“ṭāṅasi“iti
GS24paribhsu:1514_1: sūtrastha bhāṣya viruddhā ca / tatra ca inādeśe ikārapratyākhyānaṃ yogavibhāgenaiva kṛtamiti bahavaḥ //
GS24paribhsu:1521: tatra hi sūtre algrahaṇahalgrahaṇayorviśeṣavicāre saṃjñāyāṃ halgrahaṇam“ṇyakṣatriya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti vācyamiti trīṇi padānyalgrahaṇe,
GS24paribhsu:1522: tadekaṃ svādilope halgrahaṇam“ṇya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti na vācyam,
GS24paribhsu:1523: apṛktasyeti vācyamiti trīṇyeva padānīti nāsti lāghavakṛto viśeṣa ityuktam/
GS24paribhsu:1524: “aci śnu“iti sūtre iṇa ityeva siddhe yvoriti saṃmṛdya grahaṇānna pūrveṇeṇgrahaṇam/ tatra
GS24paribhsu:1525: vibhakti nirdeśe saṃmṛdya grahaṇe ca sārdhāstrisro mātrā iṇ grahaṇe tisro mātrā iti laṇsūtre bhāṣyokteḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1528: tatrāyamarthaḥ --“ṣṭhivuklamu“iti sūtre 'śitīti na karttavyaṃ bhavati' iti bhāṣye na kevalaṃ mātrālāghavaṃ yāvadayamapyartha iti kaiyaṭokteḥ prāyeṇeti śivam//
